atk-s0102a:1309_4: Cakkhuviññeyyānaṃ rūpānaṃ iṭṭhānaṃ kantānaṃ manāpānaṃ manoramānaṃ lokāmisapaṭisaṃyuttānaṃ appaṭilābhaṃ
atk-s0102a:1309_5: vā appaṭilābhato samanupassato pubbe vā apaṭiladdhapubbaṃ atītaṃ niruddhaṃ vipariṇataṃ samanussarato
atk-s0102a:1310_0: Evarūpaṃ domanassaṃ sevitabbanti evarūpaṃ nekkhammasitadomanassaṃ sevitabbaṃ.
atk-s0102a:1310_3: Rūpānaṃ tveva aniccataṃ viditvā vipariṇāmavirāganirodhaṃ pubbe ceva rūpā etarahi ca sabbe te rūpā aniccā, dukkhā,
atk-s0102a:1310_4: vipariṇāmadhammāti evametaṃ yathābhūtaṃ sampappaññāya disvā anuttaresu vimokkhesu pihaṃ upaṭṭhāpeti ‘kudāssu nāmāhaṃ tadāyatanaṃ,
atk-s0102a:1310_7: Iti anuttaresu vimokkhesu pihaṃ upaṭṭhāpayato uppajjati pihapaccayā domanassaṃ,
atk-s0102a:1310_9: idaṃ vuccati nekkhammasitadomanassa”nti evaṃ chasu dvāresu iṭṭhārammaṇe āpāthagate anuttaravimokkhasaṅkhātaariyaphaladhammesu
atk-s0102a:1310_10: pihaṃ upaṭṭhapetvā tadadhigamāya aniccādivasena vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā ussukkāpetumasakkontassa imampi pakkhaṃ,
atk-s0102a:1310_12: imampi saṃvaccharaṃ vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā ariyabhūmiṃ pāpuṇituṃ nāsakkhinti anusocato uppannaṃ domanassaṃ.
atk-s0102a:1311_0: Tattha yaṃ ce savitakkasavicāranti tasmimpi duvidhe domanasse gehasitadomanassameva savitakkasavicāradomanassaṃ nāma.
atk-s0102a:1311_4: paṭhamadutiyajjhānavasena ca uppannadomanassaṃ pana avitakkaavicāradomanassanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0102a:1311_7: etassa pana bhikkhuno maññanavasena savitakkasavicāranti ca avitakkaavicāranti ca vuttaṃ.
atk-s0102a:1312_1: idha bhikkhu domanassapaccayabhūte savitakkasavicāradhamme avitakkaavicāradhamme ca domanassapaccayā
atk-s0102a:1312_2: eva uppanne maggaphaladhamme ca aññesaṃ paṭipattidassanavasena domanassanti gahetvā “kadā nu kho me savitakkasavicāradomanasse
atk-s0102a:1312_4: kadā avitakkaavicāradomanasse”ti ca “kadā nu kho me savitakkasavicāradomanassaphalasamāpatti nibbattitā bhavissati,
atk-s0102a:1312_8: Temāsikaṃ gahetvā paṭhamamāse ekaṃ yāmaṃ jaggati,
atk-s0102a:1312_17: Tatrāpi dve dve māse vuttanayena paṭipajjitvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇituṃ asakkonto visesetvā navamāsikaṃ gaṇhāti.
atk-s0102a:1312_18: Tatrāpi tayo tayo māse tatheva paṭipajjitvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇituṃ asakkontassa “na ladvaṃ vata me sabrahmacārīhi
atk-s0102a:1312_19: saddhiṃ visuddhipavāraṇaṃ pavāretu”nti āvajjato domanassaṃ uppajjati,
atk-s0102a:1314_1: Tassovāde ṭhatvā tiṃsasahassā bhikkhū arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu.
atk-s0102a:1314_2: Atheko bhikkhu “mayhaṃ tāva abbhantare guṇā appamāṇā,
atk-s0102a:1314_3: kīdisā nu kho me ācariyassa guṇā”ti āvajjanto puthujjanabhāvaṃ passitvā “amhākaṃ ācariyo aññesaṃ avassayo hoti,
atk-s0102a:1314_5: ovādamassa dassāmī”ti ākāsena gantvā vihārasamīpe otaritvā divāṭṭhāne nisinnaṃ ācariyaṃ upasaṅkamitvā vattaṃ dassetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
atk-s0102a:1315_12: Tattha aṭṭhakathātherā attano kaṅkhaṃ vinodenti, āvusoti.
atk-s0102a:1315_21: Tato paṭṭhāya yāva aruṇā apare pucchanti, āvusoti.
atk-s0102a:1315_28: nanu mukhaṃ dhovitvā senāsanaṃ pavisitvā tayo cattāro pallaṅke usumaṃ gāhāpetvā yonisomanasikāre kammaṃ karontānaṃ okāsakālena bhavitabbaṃ siyā,
atk-s0102a:1315_32: na me tumhākaṃ anumodanāya atthoti ākāse uppatitvā agamāsi.
atk-s0102a:1316_2: mayhaṃ pana aṅkusako bhavissāmīti āgato”ti ñatvā “idāni okāso na bhavissati,
atk-s0102a:1316_3: paccūsakāle gamissāmī”ti pattacīvaraṃ samīpe katvā sabbaṃ divasabhāgaṃ paṭhamayāmamajjhimayāmañca dhammaṃ
atk-s0102a:1316_4: vācetvā pacchimayāme ekasmiṃ there uddesaṃ gahetvā nikkhante pattacīvaraṃ gahetvā teneva saddhiṃ nikkhanto.
atk-s0102a:1316_5: Nisinnaantevāsikā ācariyo kenaci papañcena nikkhantoti maññiṃsu.
atk-s0102a:1316_6: Nikkhanto thero koci deva samānācariyabhikkhūti saññaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0102a:1317_1: dvīhatīheneva pāpuṇitvā paccāgamissāmī”ti antevāsikānaṃ anārocetvāva āsāḷhīmāsassa juṇhapakkhaterasiyā
atk-s0102a:1317_2: nikkhanto gāmantapabbhāraṃ gantvā caṅkamaṃ āruyha kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasikaronto taṃ divasaṃ arahattaṃ gahetuṃ nāsakkhi.
atk-s0102a:1317_5: Tayo māse pana tīṇi divasāni viya yāva mahāpavāraṇā tāva jānissāmī”ti vassaṃ upagantvāpi gahetuṃ nāsakkhi.
atk-s0102a:1317_11: Tato “na mañce mayhaṃ catūhi iriyāpathehi maggaphalaṃ uppajjissati,
atk-s0102a:1317_12: arahattaṃ appatvā neva mañce piṭṭhiṃ pasāressāmi,
atk-s0102a:1317_13: na pāde dhovissāmī”ti mañcaṃ ussāpetvā ṭhapesi.
atk-s0102a:1317_17: Gāmadārakā therassa pādesu phālitaṭṭhānāni kaṇṭakehi sibbanti,
atk-s0102a:1317_18: davaṃ karontāpi “ayyassa mahāsīvattherassa viya pādā hontū”ti davaṃ karonti.
atk-s0102a:1318_0: Thero tiṃsasaṃvacchare mahāpavāraṇādivase ālambaṇaphalakaṃ nissāya ṭhito “idāni me tiṃsa vassāni samaṇadhammaṃ karontassa,
atk-s0102a:1318_2: addhā me imasmiṃ attabhāve maggo vā phalaṃ vā natthi,
atk-s0102a:1318_3: na me laddhaṃ sabrahmacārīhi saddhiṃ visuddhipavāraṇaṃ pavāretu”nti cintesi.
atk-s0102a:1318_6: Atha avidūraṭṭhāne ekā devadhītā rodamānā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0102a:1318_11: tena ahampi ekaṃ dve maggaphalāni nibbattessāmīti rodāmi,
atk-s0102a:1319_3: anucchavikaṃ nu kho te eta”nti vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ aggahesi.
atk-s0102a:1319_4: So “idāni nipajjissāmī”ti senāsanaṃ paṭijaggitvā mañcakaṃ paññapetvā udakaṭṭhāne udakaṃ paccupaṭṭhapetvā “pāde dhovissāmī”ti sopānaphalake nisīdi.
atk-s0102a:1320_0: Antevāsikāpissa “amhākaṃ ācariyassa samaṇadhammaṃ kātuṃ gacchantassa tiṃsa vassāni,
atk-s0102a:1320_2: nāsakkhī”ti āvajjayamānā “arahattaṃ patvā pādadhovanatthaṃ nisinno”ti disvā “amhākaṃ ācariyo amhādisesu
atk-s0102a:1320_4: ahaṃ dhovissāmi ahaṃ dhovissāmī”ti tiṃsasahassānipi ākāsena gantvā vanditvā “pāde dhovissāma,
atk-s0102a:1320_6: idāni tiṃsa vassāni honti mama pādānaṃ adhotānaṃ,
atk-s0102a:1321_1: “mayhaṃ ayyo mahāsīvatthero arahattaṃ patto tiṃsasahassānaṃ antevāsikānaṃ ‘pāde dhovissāmā’ti āgatānaṃ pāde dhovituṃ na deti.
atk-s0102a:1321_2: Mādise pana upaṭṭhāke tiṭṭhante ‘mayhaṃ ayyo sayaṃ pāde dhovissatī’ti aṭṭhānametaṃ,
atk-s0102a:1321_3: ahaṃ dhovissāmī”ti sanniṭṭhānaṃ katvā sujātāya deviyā saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṅghassa santike pāturahosi.
atk-s0102a:1321_4: So sujaṃ asurakaññaṃ purato katvā “apetha, bhante,
atk-s0102a:1321_5: mātugāmo”ti okāsaṃ kāretvā theraṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā purato ukkuṭiko nisīditvā “pāde dhovissāmi,
atk-s0102a:1321_7: idāni me tiṃsa vassāni pādānaṃ adhotānaṃ,
atk-s0102a:1321_9: yojanasate ṭhitānampi kaṇṭhe āsattakuṇapaṃ viya hoti,
atk-s0102a:1321_12: tumhākaṃ pana sīlagandho cha devaloke atikkamitvā upari bhavaggaṃ patvā ṭhito.
atk-s0102a:1321_13: Sīlagandhato añño uttaritaro gandho nāma natthi, bhante,
atk-s0102a:1321_14: tumhākaṃ sīlagandhenamhi āgatoti vāmahatthena gopphakasandhiyaṃ gahetvā dakkhiṇahatthena pādatalaṃ parimajji.
atk-s0102a:1321_16: Sakko pāde dhovitvā vanditvā devalokameva gato.
atk-s0102a:1322_0: Evaṃ “na labhāmi sabrahmacārīhi saddhiṃ visuddhipavāraṇaṃ pavāretu”nti āvajjantassa uppannaṃ domanassaṃ
atk-s0102a:1322_1: nissāya bhikkhuno maññanavasena vipassanāya ārammaṇampi vipassanāpi maggopi phalampi savitakkasavicāradomanassanti
atk-s0102a:1323_0: Tattha eko bhikkhu savitakkasavicāradomanasse vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā idaṃ domanassaṃ kiṃ nissitanti upadhārento
atk-s0102a:1323_1: vatthunissitanti pajānātīti phassapañcamake vuttanayeneva anukkamena arahatte patiṭṭhāti.
atk-s0102a:1323_2: Eko avitakkāvicāre domanasse vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā vuttanayeneva arahatte patiṭṭhāti.
atk-s0102a:1324_1: Evarūpā upekkhā na sevitabbāti evarūpā gehasitaupekkhā na sevitabbā.
atk-s0102a:1324_3: Cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā uppajjati upekkhā bālassa mūḷhassa puthujjanassa anodhijinassa avipākajinassa anādīnavadassāvino assutavato puthujjanassa,
atk-s0102a:1324_6: tasmā sā upekkhā gehasitāti vuccatī”ti evaṃ chasu dvāresu iṭṭhārammaṇe āpāthagate guḷapiṇḍike nilīnamakkhikā
atk-s0102a:1324_7: viya rūpādīni anativattamānā tattheva laggā laggitā hutvā uppannā kāmaguṇanissitā upekkhā na sevitabbā.
atk-s0102a:1325_0: Evarūpā upekkhā sevitabbāti evarūpā nekkhammasitā upekkhā sevitabbā.
atk-s0102a:1325_3: Rūpānaṃ tveva aniccataṃ viditvā vipariṇāmavirāganirodhaṃ ‘pubbe ceva rūpā etarahi ca,
atk-s0102a:1325_5: vipariṇāmadhammā’ti evametaṃ yathābhūtaṃ sammappaññāya passato uppajjati upekkhā,
atk-s0102a:1325_9: Evaṃ chasu dvāresu iṭṭhāniṭṭhaārammaṇe āpāthagate iṭṭhe arajjantassa,
atk-s0102a:1325_11: asamapekkhanena asammuyhantassa uppannā vipassanā ñāṇasampayuttā upekkhā.
atk-s0102a:1325_12: Apica vedanāsabhāgā tatra majjhattupekkhāpi ettha upekkhāva.
atk-s0102a:1325_13: Tasmā sevitabbāti ayaṃ nekkhammavasena vipassanāvasena anussatiṭṭhānavasena paṭhamadutiyatatiyacatutthajjhānavasena
atk-s0102a:1326_0: Ettha yaṃ ce savitakkaṃ savicāranti tāyapi nekkhammasitaupekkhāya yaṃ nekkhammavasena vipassanāvasena
atk-s0102a:1326_1: anussatiṭṭhānavasena paṭhamajjhānavasena ca uppannaṃ savitakkasavicāraṃ upekkhanti jāneyya.
atk-s0102a:1326_2: Yaṃ ce avitakkaṃ avicāranti yaṃ pana dutiyajjhānādivasena uppannaṃ avitakkāvicāraṃ upekkhanti jāneyya.
atk-s0102a:1326_3: Ye avitakke avicāre te paṇītatareti etāsu dvīsu yā avitakkaavicārā,
atk-s0102a:1326_7: Eko hi bhikkhu savitakkasavicāraupekkhāya vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā ayaṃ upekkhā kiṃ nissitāti upadhārento
atk-s0102a:1326_8: vatthunissitāti pajānātīti phassapañcamake vuttanayeneva anukkamena arahatte patiṭṭhāti.
atk-s0102a:1326_9: Eko avitakkāvicārāya upekkhāya vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā vuttanayeneva arahatte patiṭṭhāti.
atk-s0102a:1326_13: Tenāha bhagavā “ye avitakke avicāre te paṇītatare”ti.
atk-s0102a:1327_3: bhikkhu papañcasaññāsaṅkhānirodhasāruppagāminiṃ paṭipadaṃ paṭipanno hotīti bhagavā arahattanikūṭena desanaṃ niṭṭhapesi.
atk-s0102a:1327_7: Ekassapi bahūnampi dhammaṃ desentā arahatteneva kūṭaṃ gaṇhanti.
atk-s0102a:1327_8: Sattā pana attano anurūpe upanissaye ṭhitā keci sotāpannā honti,
atk-s0102a:1327_14: Yathā hi rājā bhojanakāle attano pamāṇena piṇḍaṃ uddharitvā rājakumārānaṃ upaneti,
atk-s0102a:1327_15: te tato attano mukhappamāṇeneva kabaḷaṃ karonti,
atk-s0102a:1327_16: evaṃ bhagavā attajjhāsayānurūpāya desanāya arahatteneva kūṭaṃ gaṇhāti.
atk-s0102a:1327_17: Veneyyā attano upanissayappamāṇena tato sotāpattiphalamattaṃ vā sakadāgāmianāgāmiarahattaphalameva vā gaṇhanti.
atk-s0102a:1327_19: Sotāpanno ca hutvā bhagavato puratoyeva cavitvā taruṇasakko hutvā nibbatti,
atk-s0102a:1327_20: devatānañhi cavamānānaṃ attabhāvassa gatāgataṭṭhānaṃ nāma na paññāyati,
atk-s0102a:1327_23: Sakko pana sayaṃ cutattā bhagavā ca appaṭihatañāṇattā dveva janā jāniṃsu.
atk-s0102a:1327_24: Atha sakko cintesi “mayhañhi bhagavatā tīsu ṭhānesu nibbattitaphalameva kathitaṃ,
atk-s0102a:1327_25: ayañca pana maggo vā phalaṃ vā sakuṇikāya viya uppatitvā gahetuṃ na sakkā,
atk-s0102a:1329_1: Tato taṃ pucchanto kathaṃ paṭipanno pana,
atk-s0102a:1329_5: Sīlakathā ca nāmesā kammapathavasena vā paṇṇattivasena vā kathetabbā hoti.
atk-s0102a:1330_0: Tattha kammapathavasena kathentena asevitabbakāyasamācāro tāva pāṇātipātaadinnādānamicchācārehi kathetabbo.
atk-s0102a:1330_2: Sevitabbakāyasamācāro pāṇātipātādiveramaṇīhi ceva kāyadvāre paññattasikkhāpadaavītikkamena ca kathetabbo.
atk-s0102a:1330_3: Asevitabbavacīsamācāro musāvādādivacīduccaritena ceva vacīdvāre paññattasikkhāpadavītikkamena ca kathetabbo.
atk-s0102a:1330_4: Sevitabbavacīsamācāro musāvādādiveramaṇīhi ceva vacīdvāre paññattasikkhāpadaavītikkamena ca kathetabbo.
atk-s0102a:1331_1: Sā kāyavacīsamācāragahaṇena gahitāpi samānā yasmā ājīvaṭṭhamakasīlaṃ nāma etasmiññeva dvāradvaye uppajjati, na ākāse,
atk-s0102a:1332_8: ekacco attanā jātidhammo samāno jātidhammaṃyeva pariyesati,
atk-s0102a:1333_12: etthāyaṃ gathito mucchito ajjhāpanno attanā jātidhammo samāno jātidhammaṃyeva pariyesati.
atk-s0102a:1335_11: etthāyaṃ gathito mucchito ajjhāpanno attanā byādhidhammo samāno byādhidhammaṃyeva pariyesati.
atk-s0102a:1337_0: Kiñca, bhikkhave, sokadhammaṃ vadetha? Puttabhariyaṃ…pe… sokadhammaṃyeva pariyesati.
atk-s0102a:1338_6: etthāyaṃ gathito mucchito ajjhāpanno attanā saṃkilesadhammo samāno saṃkilesadhammaṃyeva pariyesati. Ayaṃ,
atk-s0102a:1339_2: evaṃ pavattā sabbāpi anesanā anariyapariyesanāyevāti veditabbā.
atk-s0102a:1340_4: ekacco attanā jātidhammo samāno jātidhamme ādīnavaṃ viditvā ajātaṃ anuttaraṃ yogakkhemaṃ nibbānaṃ pariyesati,
atk-s0102a:1340_6: saṃkilesadhammo samāno saṃkilesadhamme ādīnavaṃ viditvā asaṃkiliṭṭhaṃ anuttaraṃ yogakkhemaṃ nibbānaṃ pariyesati.
atk-s0102a:1341_0: Apica pañca kuhanādīni cha agocare ekavīsatividhañca anesanaṃ vajjetvā bhikkhācariyāya dhammena samena pariyesanāpi ariyapariyesanāyevāti veditabbā.
atk-s0102a:1342_0: Ettha ca yo yo “na sevitabbo”ti vutto,
atk-s0102a:1342_1: so so pubbabhāge pāṇātipātādīnaṃ sambhārapariyesanāpayogakaraṇagamanakālato paṭṭhāya na sevitabbova.
atk-s0102a:1342_4: Apica saṅghabhedādīnaṃ atthāya parakkamantānaṃ devadattādīnaṃ viya kāyasamācāro na sevitabbo,
atk-s0102a:1342_5: divasassa dvattikkhattuṃ tiṇṇaṃ ratanānaṃ upaṭṭhānagamanādivasena pavatto dhammasenāpatimahāmoggallānattherādīnaṃ viya kāyasamācāro sevitabbo.
atk-s0102a:1342_6: Dhanuggahapesanādivasena vācaṃ bhindantānaṃ devadattādīnaṃ viya vacīsamācāro na sevitabbo,
atk-s0102a:1342_7: tiṇṇaṃ ratanānaṃ guṇakittanādivasena pavatto dhammasenāpatimahāmoggallānattherādīnaṃ viya vacīsamācāro sevitabbo.
atk-s0102a:1342_8: Anariyapariyesanaṃ pariyesantānaṃ devadattādīnaṃ viya pariyesanā na sevitabbā,
atk-s0102a:1342_9: ariyapariyesanameva pariyesantānaṃ dhammasenāpatimahāmoggallānattherādīnaṃ viya pariyesanā sevitabbā.
atk-s0102a:1343_0: Evaṃ paṭipanno khoti evaṃ asevitabbaṃ kāyavacīsamācāraṃ pariyesanañca pahāya sevitabbānaṃ pāripūriyā paṭipanno,
atk-s0102a:1343_2: bhikkhu pātimokkhasaṃvarāya uttamajeṭṭhakasīlasaṃvaratthāya paṭipanno nāma hotīti bhagavā khīṇāsavassa āgamanīyapubbabhāgapaṭipadaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0102a:1345_3: Vissajjane panassa cakkhuviññeyyaṃ rūpampītiādi sevitabbarūpādivasena indriyasaṃvaradassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0102a:1345_4: Tattha evaṃ vutteti heṭṭhā somanassādipañhāvissajjanānaṃ sutattā imināpi evarūpena bhavitabbanti sañjātapaṭibhāno
atk-s0102a:1345_5: bhagavatā evaṃ vutte sakko devānamindo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca,
atk-s0102a:1345_9: Kathetukāmopi hi yo atthaṃ sampādetuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0102a:1345_10: atthaṃ sampādetuṃ sakkonto vā na kathetukāmo hoti,
atk-s0102a:1345_13: sakkoti ca atthaṃ sampādetuṃ tenassa bhagavā okāsamakāsi.
atk-s0102a:1346_0: Tattha evarūpaṃ na sevitabbanti ādīsu ayaṃ saṅkhepo –
atk-s0102a:1346_2: taṃ na sevitabbaṃ na daṭṭhabbaṃ na oloketabbanti attho.
atk-s0102a:1346_3: Yaṃ pana passato asubhasaññā vā saṇṭhāti,
atk-s0102a:1347_0: Yaṃ cittakkharaṃ cittabyañjanampi saddaṃ suṇato rāgādayo uppajjanti,
atk-s0102a:1347_2: Yaṃ pana atthanissitaṃ dhammanissitaṃ kumbhadāsigītampi suṇantassa pasādo vā uppajjati,
atk-s0102a:1348_2: Yaṃ pana gandhaṃ ghāyato asubhasaññādipaṭilābho hoti,
atk-s0102a:1349_2: Yaṃ pana rasaṃ sāyato āhāre paṭikūlasaññā ceva uppajjati,
atk-s0102a:1349_3: sāyitapaccayā ca kāyabalaṃ nissāya ariyabhūmiṃ okkamituṃ sakkoti,
atk-s0102a:1349_4: mahāsīvattherabhāgineyyasīvasāmaṇerassa viya paribhuñjantasseva kilesakkhayo vā hoti,
atk-s0102a:1350_2: Yaṃ pana phusato sāriputtattherādīnaṃ viya āsavakkhayo ceva,
atk-s0102a:1350_4: pacchimā ca janatā diṭṭhānugatiṃ āpādanena anuggahitā hoti,
atk-s0102a:1350_6: Sāriputtatthero kira tiṃsa vassāni mañce piṭṭhiṃ na pasāresi.
atk-s0102a:1350_8: Mahākassapatthero vīsavassasataṃ mañce piṭṭhiṃ na pasāresi.
atk-s0102a:1350_16: Nāḷakatthero yāvaparinibbānā mañce piṭṭhiṃ na pasāresīti.
atk-s0102a:1351_0: Ye manoviññeyye dhamme samannāharantassa rāgādayo uppajjanti, “aho,
atk-s0102a:1351_1: vata yaṃ paresaṃ paravittūpakaraṇaṃ taṃ mamassā”tiādinā nayena vā abhijjhādīni āpāthamāgacchanti evarūpā dhammā na sevitabbā.
atk-s0102a:1351_3: ye vā pana tiṇṇaṃ therānaṃ dhammā,
atk-s0102a:1351_5: Tayo kira therā vassūpanāyikadivase kāmavitakkādayo akusalavitakkā na vitakketabbāti katikaṃ akaṃsu.
atk-s0102a:1351_7: imasmiṃ temāse kittake ṭhāne cittassa dhāvituṃ dinna”nti? Na, bhante,
atk-s0102a:1351_16: bahi dhāvituṃ na adāsinti. Tumhehi, bhante,
atk-s0102a:1353_7: Tasmiṃ anekadhātunānādhātusmiṃ loke yaṃ yadeva dhātuṃ yaṃ yadeva ajjhāsayaṃ sattā abhinivisanti gaṇhanti,
atk-s0102a:1353_9: Thāmasā parāmāsāti thāmena ca parāmāsena ca.
atk-s0102a:1353_12: Idameva saccaṃ moghamaññanti idaṃ amhākameva vacanaṃ saccaṃ,
atk-s0102a:1355_2: Nibbānaṃ yasmā taṃ āgamma taṇhā saṅkhiyati vinassati,
atk-s0102a:1356_0: Ettāvatā ca bhagavatā cuddasapi mahāpañhā byākatā honti.
atk-s0102a:1356_1: Cuddasa mahāpañhā nāma issāmacchariyaṃ eko pañho,
atk-s0102a:1357_5: Tasmā ayaṃ purisoti yasmā ejā attanā katakammānurūpena purisaṃ tattha tattha abhinibbattatthāya kaḍḍhati,
atk-s0102a:1357_6: tasmā ayaṃ puriso tesaṃ tesaṃ bhavānaṃ vasena uccāvacaṃ āpajjati.
atk-s0102a:1357_15: Yathāsutaṃ yathāpariyattanti yathā mayā suto ceva uggahito ca, evaṃ.
atk-s0102a:1357_17: Na cāhaṃ tesanti ahaṃ pana tesaṃ sāvako na sampajjāmi.
atk-s0102a:1359_3: Samupabyūḷhoti samāpanno nalāṭena nalāṭaṃ paharaṇākārappatto viya.
atk-s0102a:1359_4: Etesaṃ kira kadāci mahāsamuddapiṭṭhe saṅgāmo hoti tattha pana chedanavijjhanādīhi aññamaññaṃ ghāto nāma natthi,
atk-s0102a:1359_8: Tattha yasmiṃ saṅgāme devā puna apaccāgamanāya asure jiniṃsu,
atk-s0102a:1359_9: taṃ sandhāya tasmiṃ kho pana bhantetiādimāha.
atk-s0102a:1359_11: Duvidhampi ojaṃ ettha devaloke devāyeva paribhuñjissantīti evamassa āvajjantassa balavapītisomanassaṃ uppajji.
atk-s0102a:1359_15: Ekantanibbidāyāti ekanteneva vaṭṭe nibbindanatthāyāti sabbaṃ mahāgovindasutte vuttameva.
atk-s0102a:1360_3: Devabhūtassa me satoti devassa me sato.
atk-s0102a:1360_4: Punarāyu ca me laddhoti puna aññena kammavipākena me jīvitaṃ laddhanti,
atk-s0102a:1360_5: iminā attano cutabhāvaṃ ceva upapannabhāvañca āvikaroti.
atk-s0102a:1361_1: Āyuṃ hitvā amānusanti dibbaṃ āyuṃ jahitvā.
atk-s0102a:1361_3: Yattha me ramatī manoti yattha me mano ramissati,
atk-s0102a:1361_4: tattheva khattiyakulādīsu gabbhaṃ upagacchissāmīti sattakkhattuṃ deve ca mānuse cāti imamatthaṃ dīpeti.
atk-s0102a:1362_0: Ñāyena viharissāmīti manussesu upapannopi mātaraṃ jīvitā voropanādīnaṃ abhabbattā ñāyena kāraṇena samena viharissāmīti attho.
atk-s0102a:1363_0: Sambodhi ce bhavissatīti idaṃ sakadāgāmimaggaṃ sandhāya vadati,
atk-s0102a:1363_2: Aññātā viharissāmīti aññātā ājānitukāmo hutvā viharissāmi.
atk-s0102a:1363_3: Sveva anto bhavissatīti so eva me manussaloke anto bhavissatīti.
atk-s0102a:1364_1: devalokasmiṃ uttamoti puna devalokasmiṃ uttamo sakko devānamindo bhavissāmīti vadati.
atk-s0102a:1365_1: So nivāso bhavissatīti ye te āyunā ca paññāya ca akaniṭṭhā jeṭṭhakā sabbadevehi paṇītatarā devā,
atk-s0102a:1365_3: Ayaṃ kira tato sakkattabhāvato cuto tasmiṃ attabhāve anāgāmimaggassa paṭiladdhattā uddhaṃsoto akaniṭṭhagāmī
atk-s0102a:1365_4: hutvā avihādīsu nibbattanto avasāne akaniṭṭhe nibbattissati.
atk-s0102a:1365_10: akaniṭṭhesu soḷasāti ekatiṃsa kappasahassāni brahmaāyuṃ anubhavissati.
atk-s0102a:1365_11: Sakko devarājā anāthapiṇḍiko gahapati visākhā mahāupāsikāti tayopi hi ime ekappamāṇaāyukā eva,
atk-s0102a:1365_12: vaṭṭābhiratasattā nāma etehi sadisā sukhabhāgino nāma natthi.
atk-s0102a:1366_2: Yassu maññāmi samaṇeti ye ca samaṇe pavivittavihārinoti maññāmi.
atk-s0102a:1367_0: Ārādhanāti sampādanā. Virādhanāti asampādanā. Na sampāyantīti sampādetvā kathetuṃ na sakkonti.
atk-s0102a:1368_3: Yaṃ karomasīti yaṃ pubbe brahmuno namakkāraṃ karoma.
atk-s0102a:1368_5: ito paṭṭhāya idāni amhākaṃ brahmuno namakkārakaraṇaṃ natthīti dasseti.
atk-s0102a:1369_1: Parāmasitvāti tuṭṭhacitto sahāyaṃ hatthena hatthamhi paharanto viya pathaviṃ paharitvā,
atk-s0102a:1374_7: Kururaṭṭhavāsino kira bhikkhū bhikkhuniyo upāsakā upāsikāyo utupaccayādisampannattā tassa raṭṭhassa sappāyautupaccayasevanena
atk-s0102a:1374_9: Te cittasarīrakallatāya anuggahitapaññābalā gambhīrakathaṃ paṭiggahetuṃ samatthā honti.
atk-s0102a:1374_10: Tena nesaṃ bhagavā imaṃ gambhīradesanāpaṭiggahaṇasamatthataṃ sampassanto ekavīsatiyā ṭhānesu kammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0102a:1374_11: arahatte pakkhipitvā idaṃ gambhīratthaṃ mahāsatipaṭṭhānasuttaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0102a:1374_12: Yathā hi puriso suvaṇṇacaṅkoṭakaṃ labhitvā tattha nānāpupphāni pakkhipeyya,
atk-s0102a:1374_13: suvaṇṇamañjūsaṃ vā pana labhitvā sattaratanāni pakkhipeyya,
atk-s0102a:1374_14: evaṃ bhagavā kururaṭṭhavāsiparisaṃ labhitvā gambhīradesanaṃ desesi.
atk-s0102a:1374_15: Tenevettha aññānipi gambhīratthāni imasmiṃ dīghanikāye mahānidānaṃ majjhimanikāye satipaṭṭhānaṃ,
atk-s0102a:1375_0: Apica tasmiṃ janapade catasso parisā pakatiyāva satipaṭṭhānabhāvanānuyogamanuyuttā viharanti,
atk-s0102a:1375_4: tvaṃ kataraṃ satipaṭṭhānabhāvanaṃ manasikarosī”ti pucchitā “na kiñcī”ti vadati,
atk-s0102a:1375_7: Atha naṃ “mā dāni puna evamakāsī”ti ovaditvā aññataraṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ uggaṇhāpenti.
atk-s0102a:1375_8: Yā pana “ahaṃ asukasatipaṭṭhānaṃ nāma manasikaromī”ti vadati,
atk-s0102a:1375_9: tassā “sādhu sādhū”ti sādhukāraṃ katvā “tava jīvitaṃ sujīvitaṃ,
atk-s0102a:1376_1: eko kira naṭako suvapotakaṃ gahetvā sikkhāpento vicarati.
atk-s0102a:1376_2: So bhikkhunupassayaṃ upanissāya vasitvā gamanakāle suvapotakaṃ pamussitvā gato.
atk-s0102a:1376_5: Taṃ ekadivasaṃ purato nisinnaṃ disvā mahātherī āha –
atk-s0102a:1376_7: Atthi te koci bhāvanāmanasikāroti? Natthi, ayyeti. Āvuso,
atk-s0102a:1376_8: pabbajitānaṃ santike vasantena nāma vissaṭṭhaattabhāvena bhavituṃ na vaṭṭati,
atk-s0102a:1376_12: So theriyā ovāde ṭhatvā “aṭṭhi aṭṭhī”ti sajjhāyanto carati.
atk-s0102a:1377_0: Taṃ ekadivasaṃ pātova toraṇagge nisīditvā bālātapaṃ tapamānaṃ eko sakuṇo nakhapañjarena aggahesi.
atk-s0102a:1377_3: mocema na”nti leḍḍuādīni gahetvā anubandhitvā mocesuṃ.
atk-s0102a:1377_4: Taṃ ānetvā purato ṭhapitaṃ therī āha –
atk-s0102a:1377_6: sakuṇena gahitakāle kiṃ cintesī”ti? Na, ayye,
atk-s0102a:1377_10: evaṃ ayye aṭṭhipuñjameva cintesinti. Sādhu, sādhu,
atk-s0102a:1377_14: Tasmā nesaṃ bhagavā satipaṭṭhānabuddhimeva janento idaṃ suttamabhāsi.
atk-s0102a:1380_0: Nāvā uttarasetū ca, kullo ca bhisisaṅkamo”ti.
atk-s0102a:1381_6: maggo na dvidhā pathabhūtoti evamattho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0102a:1381_17: evaṃ santepi bhagavatova so ayano tena uppāditattā.
atk-s0102a:1381_30: Pubbabhāge nānāmukhabhāvanānayappavattopi aparabhāge ekaṃ nibbānameva gacchatīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0102a:1386_0: Keci pana “na pāraṃ diguṇaṃ yantī”ti gāthānayena yasmā ekavāraṃ nibbānaṃ gacchati,
atk-s0102a:1386_3: Imassa hi atthassa sakiṃ ayanoti iminā byañjanena bhavitabbaṃ.
atk-s0102a:1386_4: Yadi pana ekaṃ ayanamassa ekā gati pavattīti evaṃ atthaṃ yojetvā vucceyya,
atk-s0102a:1386_6: attho pana ubhayathāpi na yujjati. Kasmā?
atk-s0102a:1387_0: Pubbepi ca imasmiṃ pade mahātherānaṃ sākacchā ahosiyeva.
atk-s0102a:1387_4: Ācariye pana punappunaṃ bhaṇante appaṭibāhitvā tuṇhī ahosi.
atk-s0102a:1387_8: ko nu kho ettha nicchayo”ti suttantaṃ ādito paṭṭhāya parivattento “yo hi koci,
atk-s0102a:1387_10: ime cattāro satipaṭṭhāne evaṃ bhāveyya satta vassānī”ti imasmiṃ ṭhāne sallakkhesi.
atk-s0102a:1387_11: Lokuttaramaggo uppajjitvā satta vassāni tiṭṭhamāno nāma natthi,
atk-s0102a:1387_13: Cūḷanāgena diṭṭho pubbabhāgamaggova labbhatīti ñatvā aṭṭhamiyaṃ dhammasavane saṅghuṭṭhe agamāsi.
atk-s0102a:1388_4: tena dhammāsane nisīditvā bījaniṃ gahetvā pubbagāthāsu vuttāsu therassa āsanapiṭṭhiyaṃ ṭhitassa etadahosi –
atk-s0102a:1388_7: Na attano rucimeva ucchubhāraṃ viya evaṃ ukkhipitvā vicaranti,
atk-s0102a:1388_12: So ācariyassa viya saddoti dhammaṃ ṭhapetvā “kiṃ bhante”ti āha. Āvuso, cūḷanāga,
atk-s0102a:1388_17: evarūpassāpi nāma bhikkhuno ayaṃ pañho āluḷeti,
atk-s0102a:1388_18: anāgate mama bhātikā imaṃ pañhaṃ āluḷessantīti suttaṃ gahetvā imaṃ pañhaṃ niccalaṃ karissāmī”ti paṭisambhidāmaggato
atk-s0102a:1395_2: Sattānaṃ visuddhiyāti rāgādīhi malehi abhijjhāvisamalobhādīhi ca upakkilesehi kiliṭṭhacittānaṃ sattānaṃ visuddhatthāya.
atk-s0102a:1395_3: Tathā hi imināva maggena ito satasahassakappādhikānaṃ catunnaṃ asaṅkhyeyyānaṃ upari ekasmiṃyeva kappe
atk-s0102a:1395_4: nibbatte taṇhaṅkaramedhaṅkarasaraṇaṅkaradīpaṅkaranāmake buddhe ādiṃ katvā sakyamunipariyosānā aneke sammāsambuddhā
atk-s0102a:1395_5: anekasatā paccekabuddhā gaṇanapathaṃ vītivattā ariyasāvakā cāti ime sattā sabbe cittamalaṃ pavāhetvā
atk-s0102a:1399_0: Citte suddhe visujjhanti, iti vuttaṃ mahesinā”.
atk-s0102a:1401_0: Sokaparidevānaṃ samatikkamāyāti sokassa ca paridevassa ca samatikkamāya pahānāyāti attho,
atk-s0102a:1401_1: ayañhi maggo bhāvito santatimahāmattādīnaṃ viya sokasamatikkamāya,
atk-s0102a:1402_0: “Yaṃ pubbe taṃ visodhehi, pacchā te mātu kiñcanaṃ;
atk-s0102a:1403_0: Majjhe ce no gahessasi, upasanto carissasī”ti. ;
atk-s0102a:1404_0: Imaṃ gāthaṃ sutvāva saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ patto. Paṭācārā –
atk-s0102a:1405_0: “Na santi puttā tāṇāya, na pitā nāpi bandhavā;
atk-s0102a:1407_1: Yasmā pana kāyavedanācittadhammesu kañci dhammaṃ anāmasitvā bhāvanā nāma natthi,
atk-s0102a:1407_2: tasmā tepi imināva maggena sokaparideve samatikkantāti veditabbā.
atk-s0102a:1408_0: Dukkhadomanassānaṃ atthaṅgamāyāti kāyikadukkhassa cetasikadomanassassa cāti imesaṃ dvinnaṃ atthaṅgamāya,
atk-s0102a:1408_2: Ayañhi maggo bhāvito tissattherādīnaṃ viya dukkhassa,
atk-s0102a:1408_3: sakkādīnaṃ viya ca domanassassa atthaṅgamāya saṃvattati.
atk-s0102a:1409_1: sāvatthiyaṃ kira tisso nāma kuṭumbikaputto cattālīsa hiraññakoṭiyo pahāya pabbajitvā agāmake araññe viharati.
atk-s0102a:1409_3: naṃ jīvitā voropethā”ti pañcasate core pesesi.
atk-s0102a:1409_9: gahetvā ajjekarattiṃ jīvitaṃ dethāti. Ko te, samaṇa,
atk-s0102a:1409_11: Thero mahantaṃ pāsāṇaṃ gahetvā dve ūruṭṭhīni bhinditvā “vaṭṭati upāsakā pāṭibhogo”ti āha.
atk-s0102a:1409_12: Te apakkamitvā caṅkamanasīse aggiṃ katvā nipajjiṃsu.
atk-s0102a:1409_13: Therassa vedanaṃ vikkhambhetvā sīlaṃ paccavekkhato parisuddhaṃ sīlaṃ nissāya pītipāmojjaṃ uppajji.
atk-s0102a:1409_14: Tato anukkamena vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhento tiyāmarattiṃ samaṇadhammaṃ katvā aruṇuggamane arahattaṃ patto imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi –
atk-s0102a:1414_0: Aparepi tiṃsa bhikkhū bhagavato santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā araññavihāre vassaṃ upagantvā “āvuso,
atk-s0102a:1414_2: na aññamaññassa santikaṃ āgantabba”nti vatvā vihariṃsu.
atk-s0102a:1414_3: Tesaṃ samaṇadhammaṃ katvā paccūsasamaye pacalāyantānaṃ eko byaggho āgantvā ekekaṃ bhikkhuṃ gahetvā gacchati.
atk-s0102a:1414_4: Na koci “maṃ byaggho gaṇhī”ti vācampi nicchāresi.
atk-s0102a:1414_5: Evaṃ pañcasu dasasu bhikkhūsu khāditesu uposathadivase “itare, āvuso,
atk-s0102a:1414_6: kuhi”nti pucchitvā ñatvā ca “idāni gahitena gahitomhīti vattabba”nti vatvā vihariṃsu.
atk-s0102a:1414_7: Atha aññataraṃ daharabhikkhuṃ purimanayeneva byaggho gaṇhi.
atk-s0102a:1414_9: Bhikkhū kattaradaṇḍe ca ukkāyo ca gahetvā mocessāmāti anubandhiṃsu.
atk-s0102a:1414_10: Byaggho bhikkhūnaṃ agatiṃ chinnataṭaṭṭhānamāruyha taṃ bhikkhuṃ pādaṅguṭṭhakato paṭṭhāya khādituṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0102a:1414_13: bhikkhūnaṃ viseso nāma evarūpe ṭhāne paññāyatī”ti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0102a:1414_14: So byagghamukhe nipannova taṃ vedanaṃ vikkhambhetvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhento yāva gopphakā khāditasamaye sotāpanno hutvā,
atk-s0102a:1414_17: hadayarūpe akhāditeyeva saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ patvā imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi –
atk-s0102a:1418_0: Kāmaṃ khādatu maṃ byaggho, aṭṭhiyā ca nhārussa ca;
atk-s0102a:1420_0: Aparopi pītamallatthero nāma gihikāle tīsu rajjesu paṭākaṃ gahetvā tambapaṇṇidīpaṃ āgamma rājānaṃ passitvā
atk-s0102a:1420_5: taṃ vo pahīnaṃ dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāya bhavissatī”ti na tumhākavākyaṃ sutvā cintesi “neva kira rūpaṃ attano,
atk-s0102a:1420_7: So taṃyeva aṅkusaṃ katvā nikkhamitvā mahāvihāraṃ gantvā pabbajjaṃ yācitvā pabbajito upasampanno dvemātikā
atk-s0102a:1420_8: paguṇā katvā tiṃsa bhikkhū gahetvā gabalavāliyaaṅgaṇaṃ gantvā samaṇadhammaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0102a:1420_10: Tamenaṃ rattiṃ eko migaluddako migoti maññamāno pahari.
atk-s0102a:1420_12: so taṃ sattiṃ harāpetvā paharaṇamukhāni tiṇavaṭṭiyā pūrāpetvā pāsāṇapiṭṭhiyaṃ attānaṃ nisīdāpetvā okāsaṃ
atk-s0102a:1420_13: kāretvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ patvā ukkāsitasaddena āgatānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ
atk-s0102a:1422_0: Na tumhākamidaṃ rūpaṃ, taṃ jaheyyātha bhikkhavo.
atk-s0102a:1425_0: Evaṃ tāva ayaṃ maggo tissattherādīnaṃ viya dukkhassa atthaṅgamāya saṃvattati.
atk-s0102a:1426_0: Sakko pana devānamindo attano pañcavidhapubbanimittaṃ disvā maraṇabhayasantajjito domanassajāto bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā pañhaṃ pucchi.
atk-s0102a:1426_1: So upekkhāpañhavissajjanāvasāne asītisahassāhi devatāhi saddhiṃ sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0102a:1426_2: Sā cassa upapatti puna pākatikāva ahosi.
atk-s0102a:1427_1: Tattha pañcasatā accharāyo rukkhato pupphāni ocinantiyo cavitvā niraye uppannā.
atk-s0102a:1427_2: So “kiṃ imā cirāyantī”ti upadhārento tāsaṃ niraye nibbattanabhāvaṃ ñatvā “kittakaṃ nu kho mama āyū”ti
atk-s0102a:1427_3: upaparikkhanto attano āyuparikkhayaṃ viditvā cavitvā tattheva niraye nibbattanabhāvaṃ disvā bhīto ativiya
atk-s0102a:1427_4: domanassajāto hutvā “imaṃ me domanassaṃ satthā vinayissati,
atk-s0102a:1427_5: na añño”ti avasesā pañcasatā accharāyo gahetvā bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā pañhaṃ pucchi –
atk-s0102a:1430_0: Sace atthi anutrastaṃ, taṃ me akkhāhi pucchitoti. ;
atk-s0102a:1434_0: So desanāpariyosāne pañcahi accharāsatehi saddhiṃ sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāya taṃ sampattiṃ thāvaraṃ katvā devalokameva agamāsīti.
atk-s0102a:1434_1: Evaṃ ayaṃ maggo bhāvito sakkādīnaṃ viya domanassassa atthaṅgamāya saṃvattatīti veditabbo.
atk-s0102a:1435_0: Ñāyassa adhigamāyāti ñāyo vuccati ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo,
atk-s0102a:1435_3: Ayañhi pubbabhāge lokiyo satipaṭṭhānamaggo bhāvito lokuttaramaggassa adhigamāya saṃvattati.
atk-s0102a:1435_5: Nibbānassa sacchikiriyāyāti taṇhāvānavirahitattā nibbānanti laddhanāmassa amatassa sacchikiriyāya,
atk-s0102a:1435_7: Ayañhi maggo bhāvito anupubbena nibbānasacchikiriyaṃ sādheti.
atk-s0102a:1436_0: Tattha kiñcāpi “sattānaṃ visuddhiyā”ti vutte sokasamatikkamādīni atthato siddhāneva honti,
atk-s0102a:1436_1: ṭhapetvā pana sāsanayuttikovide aññesaṃ na pākaṭāni,
atk-s0102a:1436_2: na ca bhagavā paṭhamaṃ sāsanayuttikovidaṃ janaṃ katvā pacchā dhammaṃ deseti.
atk-s0102a:1436_3: Tena teneva pana suttena taṃ taṃ atthaṃ ñāpeti.
atk-s0102a:1436_4: Tasmā idha yaṃ yaṃ atthaṃ ekāyanamaggo sādheti,
atk-s0102a:1436_5: taṃ taṃ pākaṭaṃ katvā dassento “sokaparidevānaṃ samatikkamāyā”tiādimāha.
atk-s0102a:1436_6: Yasmā vā yā sattānaṃ visuddhi ekāyanamaggena saṃvattati,
atk-s0102a:1436_11: Tasmā imampi kamaṃ dassento “sattānaṃ visuddhiyā”ti vatvā “sokaparidevānaṃ samatikkamāyā”tiādimāha.
atk-s0102a:1437_4: desessāmi ādikalyāṇaṃ majjhekalyāṇaṃ pariyosānakalyāṇaṃ sātthaṃ sabyañjanaṃ kevalaparipuṇṇaṃ parisuddhaṃ
atk-s0102a:1437_5: brahmacariyaṃ pakāsessāmi yadidaṃ chachakkānī”ti chachakkadesanāya aṭṭhahi padehi vaṇṇaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0102a:1437_8: ariyavaṃsā aggaññā rattaññā vaṃsaññā porāṇā asaṃkiṇṇā asaṃkiṇṇapubbā na saṅkīyanti na saṅkīyissanti,
atk-s0102a:1437_9: appaṭikuṭṭhā samaṇehi brāhmaṇehi viññūhī”ti navahi padehi vaṇṇaṃ abhāsi;
atk-s0102a:1437_10: evaṃ imassāpi ekāyanamaggassa sattānaṃ visuddhiyātiādīhi sattahi padehi vaṇṇaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0102a:1437_13: Vaṇṇabhāsanañhi sutvā te bhikkhū “ayaṃ kira maggo hadayasantāpabhūtaṃ sokaṃ,
atk-s0102a:1437_17: visuddhiṃ ñāyaṃ nibbānanti tayo visese āvahatī”ti ussāhajātā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ uggahetabbaṃ pariyāpuṇitabbaṃ dhāretabbaṃ,
atk-s0102a:1437_20: Iti tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ussāhajananatthaṃ vaṇṇaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0102a:1438_0: Yathā hi satasahassagghanikapaṇḍukambalavāṇijena ‘kambalaṃ gaṇhathā’ti ugghositepi asukakambaloti na tāva manussā jānanti.
atk-s0102a:1438_1: Kesakambalavāḷakambalādayopi hi duggandhā kharasamphassā kambalātveva vuccanti.
atk-s0102a:1438_2: Yadā pana tena gandhārako rattakambalo sukhumo ujjalo sukhasamphassoti ugghositaṃ hoti,
atk-s0102a:1438_9: ayaṃ maggo’ti vuttepi asukamaggoti na tāva pākaṭo hoti.
atk-s0102a:1438_11: “Sattānaṃ visuddhiyā”tiādimhi pana vutte “ayaṃ kira maggo cattāro upaddave hanati,
atk-s0102a:1438_12: tayo visese āvahatī”ti ussāhajātā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ uggahetabbaṃ pariyāpuṇitabbaṃ dhāretabbaṃ vācetabbaṃ,
atk-s0102a:1438_13: imañca maggaṃ bhāvetabbaṃ maññissantīti vaṇṇaṃ bhāsanto “sattānaṃ visuddhiyā”tiādimāha.
atk-s0102a:1439_5: Satipaṭṭhānāti tayo satipaṭṭhānā satigocaropi tidhā paṭipannesu sāvakesu satthuno paṭighānunayavītivattatāpi, satipi.
atk-s0102a:1439_12: Āhārasamudayā kāyassa samudayo”tiādīsu hi satigocaro satipaṭṭhānanti vuccati.
atk-s0102a:1440_1: yadariyo sevamāno satthā gaṇamanusāsituṃ arahatī”ti ettha tidhā paṭipannesu sāvakesu satthuno paṭighānunayavītivattatā “satipaṭṭhāna”nti vuttā.
atk-s0102a:1440_7: “Cattāro satipaṭṭhānā bhāvitā bahulīkatā satta sambojjhaṅge paripūrentī”tiādīsu pana satiyeva “satipaṭṭhānaṃ”ti vuccati.
atk-s0102a:1440_10: upaṭṭhāti okkanditvā pakkhanditvā pattharitvā pavattatīti attho.
atk-s0102a:1440_14: Iti sati ca sā paṭṭhānaṃ cātipi satipaṭṭhānaṃ.
atk-s0102a:1441_5: Catassopi hi etā satiyo maggaṭṭhena ekattaṃ gacchanti.
atk-s0102a:1441_10: Catassopi cetā aparabhāge kāyādīsu ārammaṇesu kiccaṃ sādhayamānā nibbānaṃ gacchanti,
atk-s0102a:1441_13: Evañca sati vacanānusandhinā sānusandhikāva desanā hoti,
atk-s0102a:1441_25: Evaṃ “ekāyanamaggo”ti ca “cattāro satipaṭṭhānā”ti ca atthato ekaṃ,
atk-s0102a:1442_0: Kasmā pana bhagavatā cattārova satipaṭṭhānā vuttā anūnā anadhikāti?
atk-s0102a:1442_2: Taṇhācaritadiṭṭhicaritasamathayānikavipassanāyānikesu hi mandatikkhavasena dvedhā dvedhā pavattesu veneyyesu
atk-s0102a:1442_7: Samathayānikassa ca mandassa akicchena adhigantabbanimittaṃ paṭhamaṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ visuddhimaggo,
atk-s0102a:1443_3: Tesaṃ tattha asubhabhāvadassanena tassa vipallāsassa pahānatthaṃ paṭhamaṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0102a:1443_4: Sukhaṃ niccaṃ attāti gahitesupi ca vedanādīsu vedanā dukkhā,
atk-s0102a:1443_8: Tesaṃ tattha dukkhādibhāvadassanena tesaṃ vipallāsānaṃ pahānatthaṃ sesāni tīṇi vuttānīti evaṃ subhasukhaniccaattabhāvavipallāsappahānatthaṃ
atk-s0102a:1443_9: vā cattārova vuttā anūnā anadhikāti veditabbā.
atk-s0102a:1443_11: atha kho caturoghayogāsavaganthaupādānaagatipahānatthampi catubbidhāhārapariññatthañca cattārova vuttāti veditabbā.
atk-s0102a:1444_0: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana saraṇavasena ceva ekattasamosaraṇavasena ca ekameva satipaṭṭhānaṃ ārammaṇavasena cattāroti etadeva vuttaṃ.
atk-s0102a:1444_1: Yathā hi catudvāre nagare pācīnato āgacchantā pācīnadisāya uṭṭhānakaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ gahetvā pācīnadvārena nagarameva pavisanti,
atk-s0102a:1444_4: Uttarato āgacchantā uttaradisāya uṭṭhānakaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ gahetvā uttaradvārena nagarameva pavisanti; evaṃ –
atk-s0102a:1445_0: Yathā pācīnato āgacchantā pācīnadisāya uṭṭhānakaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ gahetvā pācīnadvārena nagarameva pavisanti,
atk-s0102a:1445_1: evaṃ kāyānupassanāmukhena āgacchantā cuddasavidhena kāyānupassanaṃ bhāvetvā kāyānupassanābhāvanānubhāvanibbattena
atk-s0102a:1445_3: Yathā dakkhiṇato āgacchantā dakkhiṇāya disāya uṭṭhānakaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ gahetvā dakkhiṇadvārena nagarameva pavisanti,
atk-s0102a:1445_4: evaṃ vedanānupassanāmukhena āgacchantā navavidhena vedanānupassanaṃ bhāvetvā vedanānupassanābhāvanānubhāvanibbattena
atk-s0102a:1445_6: Yathā pacchimato āgacchantā pacchimadisāya uṭṭhānakaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ gahetvā pacchimadvārena nagarameva pavisanti,
atk-s0102a:1445_7: evaṃ cittānupassanāmukhena āgacchantā soḷasavidhena cittānupassanaṃ bhāvetvā cittānupassanābhāvanānubhāvanibbattena
atk-s0102a:1445_9: Yathā uttarato āgacchantā uttaradisāya uṭṭhānakaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ gahetvā uttaradvārena nagarameva pavisanti,
atk-s0102a:1445_10: evaṃ dhammānupassanāmukhena āgacchantā pañcavidhena dhammānupassanaṃ bhāvetvā dhammānupassanābhāvanānubhāvanibbattena
atk-s0102a:1445_12: Evaṃ saraṇavasena ceva ekattasamosaraṇavasena ca ekameva satipaṭṭhānaṃ ārammaṇavasena cattārova vuttāti veditabbā.
atk-s0102a:1446_5: seṭṭhattā pana paṭipattiyā bhikkhubhāvadassanato ca “bhikkhū”ti āha.
atk-s0102a:1446_6: Bhagavato hi anusāsaniṃ sampaṭicchantesu bhikkhu seṭṭho,
atk-s0102a:1446_9: Tasmiṃ gahite pana sesā gahitāva honti,
atk-s0102a:1446_12: so bhikkhu nāma hotīti paṭipattiyā bhikkhubhāvadassanatopi “bhikkhū”ti āha.
atk-s0102a:1446_13: Paṭipannako hi devo vā hotu manusso vā,
atk-s0102a:1450_0: So brāhmaṇo so samaṇo sa bhikkhū”ti. ;
atk-s0102a:1451_1: Rūpakāyo hi idha aṅgapaccaṅgānaṃ kesādīnañca dhammānaṃ samūhaṭṭhena hatthikāyarathakāyādayo viya kāyoti adhippeto.
atk-s0102a:1452_0: Kāyānupassīti kāye anupassanasīlo kāyaṃ vā anupassamāno.
atk-s0102a:1452_1: Kāyeti ca vatvāpi puna kāyānupassīti dutiyakāyaggahaṇaṃ asammissato vavatthānaghanavinibbhogādidassanatthaṃ katanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0102a:1452_4: atha kho kāyānupassīyevāti kāyasaṅkhāte vatthusmiṃ kāyānupassanākārasseva dassanena asammissato vavatthānaṃ dassitaṃ hoti.
atk-s0102a:1452_11: kadalikkhandhapattavaṭṭivinibbhujako viya rittamuṭṭhiviniveṭhako viya ca bhūtupādāyasamūhānupassīyevāti
atk-s0102a:1452_12: nānappakārato samūhavaseneva kāyasaṅkhātassa vatthuno dassanena ghanavinibbhogo dassito hoti.
atk-s0102a:1452_13: Na hettha yathāvuttasamūhavinimutto kāyo vā itthī vā puriso vā añño vā koci dhammo dissati,
atk-s0102a:1452_14: yathāvuttadhammasamūhamatteyeva pana tathā tathā sattā micchābhinivesaṃ karonti.
atk-s0102a:1453_0: “Yaṃ passati na taṃ diṭṭhaṃ, yaṃ diṭṭhaṃ taṃ na passati;
atk-s0102a:1454_0: Apassaṃ bajjhate mūḷho, bajjhamāno na muccatī”ti.
atk-s0102a:1455_5: na evaṃ aniccadukkhānattaasubhabhūteyeva imasmiṃ kāye niccasukhaattasubhabhāvānupassī,
atk-s0102a:1455_10: so satova assasatī”tiādinā nayena assāsapassāsādicuṇṇikajātaaṭṭhikapariyosāno kāyo vutto,
atk-s0102a:1455_12: āpokāyaṃ tejokāyaṃ vāyokāyaṃ kesakāyaṃ lomakāyaṃ chavikāyaṃ cammakāyaṃ maṃsakāyaṃ rudhirakāyaṃ nhārukāyaṃ
atk-s0102a:1455_14: tassa sabbassa imasmiññeva kāye anupassanato kāye kāyānupassīti evampi attho veditabbo.
atk-s0102a:1456_0: Atha vā kāye ahanti vā mamanti vā evaṃ gahetabbassa yassa kassaci ananupassanato,
atk-s0102a:1456_1: tassa tasseva pana kesalomādikassa nānādhammasamūhassa anupassanato kāye kesādidhammasamūhasaṅkhātakāyānupassīti evamattho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0102a:1457_1: no niccato”tiādinā anukkamena paṭisambhidāyaṃ āgatanayassa sabbasseva aniccalakkhaṇādino ākārasamūhasaṅkhātassa
atk-s0102a:1457_2: kāyassa anupassanatopi kāye kāyānupassīti evampi attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0102a:1457_3: Tathā hi ayaṃ kāye kāyānupassanāpaṭipadaṃ paṭipanno bhikkhu imaṃ kāyaṃ aniccānupassanādīnaṃ sattannaṃ anupassanānaṃ vasena aniccato anupassati,
atk-s0102a:1457_17: So taṃ aniccato anupassanto niccasaññaṃ pajahati,
atk-s0102a:1458_1: Ātāpīti tīsu bhavesu kilese ātāpetīti ātāpo,
atk-s0102a:1458_6: Ayaṃ pana yasmā satiyā ārammaṇaṃ pariggahetvā paññāya anupassati,
atk-s0102a:1458_7: na hi sativirahitassa anupassanā nāma atthi,
atk-s0102a:1458_12: Tasmā ettha “kāye kāyānupassī viharatī”ti ettāvatā kāyānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānaṃ vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0102a:1458_13: Atha vā yasmā anātāpino antosaṅkhepo antarāyakaro hoti,
atk-s0102a:1458_15: muṭṭhassati upāyāpariccāge anupāyāpariggahe ca asamattho hoti,
atk-s0102a:1458_17: Tasmā yesaṃ dhammānaṃ ānubhāvena taṃ sampajjati,
atk-s0102a:1458_18: tesaṃ dassanatthaṃ “ātāpī sampajāno satimā”ti idaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0102a:1459_0: Iti kāyānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānaṃ sampayogaṅgañcassa dassetvā idāni pahānaṅgaṃ dassetuṃ vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassanti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0102a:1459_1: Tattha vineyyāti tadaṅgavinayena vā vikkhambhanavinayena vā vinayitvā.
atk-s0102a:1459_3: Kāyo hi idha lujjanapalujjanaṭṭhena lokoti adhippeto.
atk-s0102a:1459_4: Yasmā panassa na kāyamatteyeva abhijjhādomanassaṃ pahīyati,
atk-s0102a:1459_6: Tasmā pañcapi upādānakkhandhā lokoti vibhaṅge vuttaṃ.
atk-s0102a:1459_7: Lokasaṅkhātattā vā tesaṃ dhammānaṃ atthuddhāranayenetaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0102a:1459_12: Tasmiṃ loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ vineyyāti evaṃ sambandho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0102a:1460_5: domanassavinayena kāye bhūtānaṃ asubhāsukhabhāvādīnaṃ apanayanassa ca pahānaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0102a:1460_6: Tena yogāvacarassa yogānubhāvo yogasamatthatā ca dīpitā hoti.
atk-s0102a:1460_8: yadidaṃ anurodhavirodhavippamutto aratiratisaho abhūtapakkhepabhūtāpanayanavirahito ca hoti.
atk-s0102a:1460_9: Anurodhavirodhavippamutto cesa aratiratisaho abhūtaṃ apakkhipanto bhūtañca anapanayanto yogasamattho hotīti.
atk-s0102a:1461_0: Aparo nayo “kāye kāyānupassī”ti ettha anupassanāya kammaṭṭhānaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0102a:1461_6: sampajaññena vipassanā abhijjhādomanassavinayena bhāvanābalaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0102a:1462_1: Yā paññā pajānanā vicayo pavicayo dhammavicayo sallakkhaṇā upalakkhaṇā paccupalakkhaṇā paṇḍiccaṃ kosallaṃ
atk-s0102a:1462_2: nepuññaṃ vebhabyā cintā upaparikkhā bhūrīmedhā pariṇāyikā vipassanā sampajaññaṃ patodo paññā paññindriyaṃ
atk-s0102a:1462_3: paññābalaṃ paññāsatthaṃ paññāpāsādo paññāāloko paññāobhāso paññāpajjoto paññāratanaṃ amoho dhammavicayo
atk-s0102a:1462_6: Imāya anupassanāya upeto hoti samupeto upagato samupagato upapanno samannāgato,
atk-s0102a:1462_8: Viharatīti iriyati pavattati pāleti yapeti yāpeti carati viharati,
atk-s0102a:1462_11: Yo cetasiko vīriyārambho nikammo parakkamo uyyāmo vāyāmo ussāho ussoḷhī thāmo dhiti asithilaparakkamatā
atk-s0102a:1462_12: anikkhittaddandatā anikkhittadhuratā dhurasampaggāhī vīriyaṃ vīriyindriyaṃ vīriyabalaṃ sammāvāyāmo,
atk-s0102a:1462_18: Yā paññā pajānanā vicayo pavicayo dhammavicayo sallakkhaṇā upalakkhaṇā paccupalakkhaṇā paṇḍiccaṃ kosallaṃ
atk-s0102a:1462_19: nepuññaṃ vebhabyā cintā upaparikkhā bhūrīmedhā pariṇāyikā vipassanā sampajaññaṃ patodo paññā paññindriyaṃ
atk-s0102a:1462_20: paññābalaṃ paññāsatthaṃ paññāpāsādo paññāāloko paññāobhāso paññāpajjoto paññāratanaṃ amoho dhammavicayo
atk-s0102a:1462_27: Yā sati anussati paṭissati sati saraṇatā dhāraṇatā apilāpanatā asammusanatā sati satindriyaṃ satibalaṃ sammāsati,
atk-s0102a:1463_0: Vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassanti tattha katamo loko?
atk-s0102a:1463_5: Yo rāgo sārāgo anunayo anurodho nandī nandirāgo cittassa sārāgo,
atk-s0102a:1463_8: Yaṃ cetasikaṃ asātaṃ cetasikaṃ dukkhaṃ cetosamphassajā asātā dukkhā vedanā,
atk-s0102a:1463_11: idañca domanassaṃ imamhi loke vinītā honti paṭivinītā santā samitā vūpasamitā atthaṅgatā abbhatthaṅgatā appitā byappitā sositā visositā byantīkatā,
atk-s0102a:1464_1: Tena saha ayaṃ aṭṭhakathānayo yathā saṃsandati,
atk-s0102a:1465_2: vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassanti ettha vedanāsu vedanānupassīti evamādīsu vedanādīnaṃ puna vacane payojanaṃ
atk-s0102a:1465_6: Dhammesu dhammānupassīti ettha pana vedanāti tisso vedanā,
atk-s0102a:1468_0: Sa ve sammaddaso bhikkhu, upasanto carissatī”ti. ;
atk-s0102a:1469_5: Yathāha “sukhā vedanā ṭhitisukhā vipariṇāmadukkhā”ti sabbaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.
atk-s0102a:1470_2: Dhammā salakkhaṇasāmaññalakkhaṇānaṃ suññatadhammassa aniccādisattānupassanānaṃ niddesavāre āgatasantādibhedānañca vasena anupassitabbā.
atk-s0102a:1470_4: Kāmañcettha yassa kāyasaṅkhāte loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ pahīnaṃ,
atk-s0102a:1470_7: Yato vā ekattha pahīnaṃ sesesupi pahīnaṃ hoti,
atk-s0102a:1470_8: tenevassa tattha pahānadassanatthampi etaṃ vuttanti veditabbanti.
atk-s0102a:1473_1: Idāni seyyathāpi nāma cheko vilīvakārako thūlakilañjasaṇhakilañjacaṅkoṭakapeḷāpuṭādīni upakaraṇāni kattukāmo
atk-s0102a:1473_2: ekaṃ mahāveṇuṃ labhitvā catudhā bhinditvā tato ekekaṃ veṇukhaṇḍaṃ gahetvā phāletvā taṃ taṃ upakaraṇaṃ kareyya,
atk-s0102a:1473_3: evameva bhagavā satipaṭṭhānadesanāya sattānaṃ anekappakāraṃ visesādhigamaṃ kattukāmo ekameva sammāsatiṃ “cattāro satipaṭṭhānā.
atk-s0102a:1473_6: bhikkhu kāye kāyānupassī viharatī”tiādinā nayena ārammaṇavasena catudhā bhinditvā tato ekekaṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0102a:1473_7: gahetvā kāyaṃ vibhajanto “kathañca bhikkhave”tiādinā nayena niddesavāraṃ vattumāraddho.
atk-s0102a:1474_3: kena ca pakārena bhikkhu kāye kāyānupassī viharatīti?
atk-s0102a:1474_5: Idha bhikkhave bhikkhūti bhikkhave imasmiṃ sāsane bhikkhu.
atk-s0102a:1474_6: Ayañhettha idhasaddo sabbappakārakāyānupassanānibbattakassa puggalassa sannissayabhūtasāsanaparidīpano aññasāsanassa tathābhāvapaṭisedhano ca.
atk-s0102a:1475_0: Araññagato vā rukkhamūlagato vā suññāgāragato vāti idamassa satipaṭṭhānabhāvanānurūpasenāsanapariggahaparidīpanaṃ.
atk-s0102a:1475_1: Imassa hi bhikkhuno dīgharattaṃ rūpādīsu ārammaṇesu anuvisaṭaṃ cittaṃ kammaṭṭhānavīthiṃ otarituṃ na icchati,
atk-s0102a:1475_3: Tasmā seyyathāpi nāma gopo kūṭadhenuyā sabbaṃ khīraṃ pivitvā vaḍḍhitaṃ kūṭavacchaṃ dametukāmo dhenuto
atk-s0102a:1475_4: apanetvā ekamante mahantaṃ thambhaṃ nikhaṇitvā tattha yottena bandheyya.
atk-s0102a:1475_5: Athassa so vaccho ito cito ca vipphanditvā palāyituṃ asakkonto tameva thambhaṃ upanisīdeyya vā upanipajjeyya vā,
atk-s0102a:1475_6: evameva imināpi bhikkhunā dīgharattaṃ rūpārammaṇādirasapānavaḍḍhitaṃ duṭṭhacittaṃ dametukāmena rūpādiārammaṇato
atk-s0102a:1475_7: apanetvā araññaṃ vā rukkhamūlaṃ vā suññāgāraṃ vā pavisitvā tattha satipaṭṭhānārammaṇatthambhe satiyottena

atk-s0102a:1479_0: Apica yasmā idaṃ kāyānupassanāya muddhabhūtaṃ sabbabuddhapaccekabuddhasāvakānaṃ visesādhigamadiṭṭhadhammasukhavihārapadaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0102a:1479_1: ānāpānassatikammaṭṭhānaṃ itthipurisahatthiassādisaddasamākulaṃ gāmantaṃ apariccajitvā na sukaraṃ sampādetuṃ,
atk-s0102a:1479_3: Agāmake pana araññe sukaraṃ yogāvacarena idaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ pariggahetvā ānāpānacatutthajjhānaṃ nibbattetvā
atk-s0102a:1479_4: tadeva jhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā saṅkhāre sammasitvā aggaphalaṃ arahattaṃ pāpuṇituṃ,
atk-s0102a:1480_1: So yathā vatthuvijjācariyo nagarabhūmiṃ passitvā suṭṭhu upaparikkhitvā “ettha nagaraṃ māpethā”ti upadisati,
atk-s0102a:1480_2: sotthinā ca nagare niṭṭhite rājakulato mahāsakkāraṃ labhati,
atk-s0102a:1480_3: evameva yogāvacarassa anurūpasenāsanaṃ upaparikkhitvā “ettha kammaṭṭhānamanuyuñjitabba”nti upadisati,
atk-s0102a:1480_4: tato tattha kammaṭṭhānamanuyuñjantena yoginā anukkamena arahatte patte “sammāsambuddho vata so bhagavā”ti mahantaṃ sakkāraṃ labhati.
atk-s0102a:1481_1: Yathā hi mahādīpirājā araññe tiṇagahanaṃ vā vanagahanaṃ vā pabbatagahanaṃ vā nissāya nilīyitvā vanamahiṃsagokaṇṇasūkarādayo mige gaṇhāti,
atk-s0102a:1481_2: evameva ayaṃ araññādīsu kammaṭṭhānaṃ anuyuñjanto bhikkhu yathākkamena cattāro magge ceva cattāri ariyaphalāni ca gaṇhāti.
atk-s0102a:1485_0: Tenassa parakkamajavayoggabhūmiṃ araññasenāsanaṃ dassento bhagavā “araññagato vā”tiādimāha.
atk-s0102a:1485_1: Ito paraṃ imasmiṃ ānāpānapabbe yaṃ vattabbaṃ siyā,
atk-s0102a:1485_5: dakkho bhamakāro vāti idañhi upamāmattameva iti ajjhattaṃ vā kāyeti idaṃ appanāmattameva ca tattha anāgataṃ,
atk-s0102a:1486_2: Dīghaṃ vā añchantoti mahantānaṃ bherīpokkharādīnaṃ likhanakāle hatthe ca pāde ca pasāretvā dīghaṃ kaḍḍhanto.
atk-s0102a:1486_3: Rassaṃ vā añchantoti khuddakānaṃ dantasūcivedhakādīnaṃ likhanakāle mandamandaṃ rassaṃ kaḍḍhanto.
atk-s0102a:1486_4: Evameva khoti evaṃ ayampi bhikkhu addhānavasena ittaravasena ca pavattānaṃ assāsapassāsānaṃ vasena dīghaṃ vā assasanto dīghaṃ assasāmīti pajānāti…pe…
atk-s0102a:1486_6: Tassevaṃ sikkhato assāsapassāsanimitte cattāri jhānāni uppajjanti,
atk-s0102a:1486_7: so jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā assāsapassāse vā pariggaṇhāti jhānaṅgāni vā.
atk-s0102a:1487_3: karajakāyo nāma cattāri mahābhūtāni upādārūpañce”ti evaṃ rūpaṃ pariggaṇhāti.
atk-s0102a:1487_5: Evaṃ nāmarūpaṃ pariggahetvā tassa paccayaṃ pariyesanto avijjādipaṭiccasamuppādaṃ disvā “paccayapaccayuppannadhammamattamevetaṃ,
atk-s0102a:1487_6: añño satto vā puggalo vā natthī”ti vitiṇṇakaṅkho sappaccayanāmarūpe tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhento anukkamena arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0102a:1487_7: Idaṃ ekassa bhikkhuno yāva arahattā niyyānamukhaṃ.
atk-s0102a:1488_3: karajakāyo rūpa”nti nāmarūpaṃ vavatthapetvā tassa paccayaṃ pariyesanto avijjādipaccayākāraṃ disvā “paccayapaccayuppannadhammamattamevetaṃ,
atk-s0102a:1488_4: añño satto vā puggalo vā natthī”ti vitiṇṇakaṅkho sappaccayanāmarūpe tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhento anukkamena arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0102a:1489_0: Iti ajjhattaṃ vāti evaṃ attano vā assāsapassāsakāye kāyānupassī viharati.
atk-s0102a:1489_4: Etenassa paguṇakammaṭṭhānaṃ aṭṭhapetvā aparāparaṃ sañcaraṇakālo kathito.
atk-s0102a:1489_5: Ekasmiṃ kāle panidaṃ ubhayaṃ na labbhati.
atk-s0102a:1490_0: Samudayadhammānupassī vāti yathā nāma kammārassa bhastañca gaggaranāḷiñca tajjañca vāyāmaṃ paṭicca vāto aparāparaṃ sañcarati,
atk-s0102a:1490_1: evaṃ bhikkhuno karajakāyañca nāsapuṭañca cittañca paṭicca assāsapassāsakāyo aparāparaṃ sañcarati.
atk-s0102a:1490_3: te passanto “samudayadhammānupassī vā kāyasmiṃ viharatī”ti vuccati.
atk-s0102a:1490_4: Vayadhammānupassī vāti yathā bhastāya apanītāya gaggaranāḷiyā bhinnāya tajje ca vāyāme asati so vāto nappavattati,
atk-s0102a:1490_5: evameva kāye bhinne nāsapuṭe viddhaste citte ca niruddhe assāsapassāsakāyo nāma nappavattatīti kāyādinirodhā
atk-s0102a:1490_6: assāsapassāsanirodhoti evaṃ passanto “vayadhammānupassī vā kāyasmiṃ viharatī”ti vuccati.
atk-s0102a:1490_7: Samudayavayadhammānupassī vāti kālena samudayaṃ kālena vayaṃ anupassanto.
atk-s0102a:1490_8: Atthi kāyoti vā panassāti kāyova atthi, na satto,
atk-s0102a:1490_11: na attaniyaṃ, nāhaṃ, na mama, na koci,
atk-s0102a:1490_12: na kassacīti evamassa sati paccupaṭṭhitā hoti.
atk-s0102a:1491_4: Atha kho yāvadeva ñāṇamattāya aparāparaṃ uttaruttari ñāṇapamāṇatthāya ceva satipamāṇatthāya ca,
atk-s0102a:1491_6: Anissito ca viharatīti taṇhānissayadiṭṭhinissayānaṃ vasena anissitova viharati.
atk-s0102a:1491_7: Na ca kiñci loke upādiyatīti lokasmiṃ kiñci rūpaṃ vā…pe…
atk-s0102a:1491_8: viññāṇaṃ vā “ayaṃ me attā vā attaniyaṃ vā”ti na gaṇhāti.
atk-s0102a:1491_9: Evampīti upari atthaṃ upādāya sampiṇḍanattho pi- kāro.
atk-s0102a:1491_10: Iminā pana padena bhagavā ānāpānapabbadesanaṃ niyyātetvā dasseti.
atk-s0102a:1492_1: tassā samuṭṭhāpikā purimataṇhā samudayasaccaṃ ubhinnaṃ appavatti nirodhasaccaṃ,
atk-s0102a:1492_3: Evaṃ catusaccavasena ussakkitvā nibbutiṃ pāpuṇātīti idamekassa assāsapassāsavasena abhiniviṭṭhassa bhikkhuno yāva arahattā niyyānamukhanti.
atk-s0102a:1495_1: Evaṃ assāsapassāsavasena kāyānupassanaṃ vibhajitvā idāni iriyāpathavasena vibhajituṃ puna caparantiādimāha.
atk-s0102a:1495_3: na panetaṃ evarūpaṃ jānanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-s0102a:1495_6: kammaṭṭhānaṃ vā satipaṭṭhānabhāvanā vā na hoti.
atk-s0102a:1495_7: Imassa pana bhikkhuno jānanaṃ sattūpaladdhiṃ pajahati,
atk-s0102a:1495_8: attasaññaṃ ugghāṭeti kammaṭṭhānañceva satipaṭṭhānabhāvanā ca hoti.
atk-s0102a:1495_11: kiṃ kāraṇā gacchatī”ti evaṃ sampajānanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-s0102a:1496_1: Na koci satto vā puggalo vā gacchati.
atk-s0102a:1496_3: Na kassaci sattassa vā puggalassa vā gamanaṃ.
atk-s0102a:1496_10: cittakiriyavāyodhātuvipphārena sakalakāyassa purato abhinīhāro gamananti vuccati.
atk-s0102a:1497_3: cittakiriyavāyodhātuvipphārena sakalakāyassa koṭito paṭṭhāya ussitabhāvo ṭhānanti vuccati.
atk-s0102a:1497_7: cittakiriyavāyodhātuvipphārena heṭṭhimakāyassa samiñjanaṃ uparimakāyassa ussitabhāvo nisajjāti vuccati.
atk-s0102a:1497_11: cittakiriyavāyodhātuvipphārena sakalasarīrassa tiriyato pasāraṇaṃ sayananti vuccatīti.
atk-s0102a:1498_0: Tassa evaṃ pajānato evaṃ hoti “satto gacchati,
atk-s0102a:1498_2: atthato pana koci satto gacchanto vā ṭhito vā natthi.
atk-s0102a:1498_5: na ca kiñci sakaṭaṃ nāma gacchantaṃ vā ṭhitaṃ vā atthi,
atk-s0102a:1498_6: cattāro pana goṇe yojetvā chekamhi sārathimhi pājente “sakaṭaṃ gacchati,
atk-s0102a:1498_11: “Gacchāmi tiṭṭhāmī”ti citte uppanne vāyodhātu viññattiṃ janayamānā uppajjati,
atk-s0102a:1500_0: Yathā yāti tathā kāyo, yāti vātāhato ayaṃ.
atk-s0102a:1503_0: Ko nāma ettha so satto, yo vinā hetupaccaye;
atk-s0102a:1504_0: Attano ānubhāvena, tiṭṭhe vā yadi vā vaje”ti.
atk-s0102a:1505_0: Tasmā evaṃ hetupaccayavaseneva pavattāni gamanādīni sallakkhento esa “gacchanto vā gacchāmīti pajānāti, ṭhito vā,
atk-s0102a:1506_0: Yathā yathā vā panassa kāyo paṇihito hoti,
atk-s0102a:1506_3: yena yena vā ākārenassa kāyo ṭhito hoti,
atk-s0102a:1507_0: Iti ajjhattaṃ vāti evaṃ attano vā catuiriyāpathapariggaṇhanena kāye kāyānupassī viharati.

atk-s0102a:1507_4: Samudayadhammānupassī vātiādīsu pana avijjāsamudayā rūpasamudayotiādinā nayena pañcahākārehi rūpakkhandhassa samudayo ca vayo ca nīharitabbo.
atk-s0102a:1508_4: Evaṃ catusaccavasena ussakkitvā nibbutiṃ pāpuṇātīti idamekassa catuiriyāpathapariggāhakassa bhikkhuno yāva arahattā niyyānamukhanti.
atk-s0102a:1511_1: Evaṃ iriyāpathavasena kāyānupassanaṃ vibhajitvā idāni catusampajaññavasena vibhajituṃ puna caparantiādimāha.
atk-s0102a:1511_3: Iti ajjhattaṃ vāti evaṃ catusampajaññapariggaṇhanena attano vā kāye,
atk-s0102a:1511_6: kālena vā parassa kāye kāyānupassī viharati.
atk-s0102a:1511_7: Idhāpi samudayavayadhammānupassītiādīsu rūpakkhandhasseva samudayo ca vayo ca nīharitabbo.
atk-s0102a:1512_4: Evaṃ catusaccavasena ussakkitvā nibbutiṃ pāpuṇātīti idamekassa catusampajaññapariggāhakassa bhikkhuno vasena yāva arahattā niyyānamukhanti.
atk-s0102a:1515_1: Evaṃ catusampajaññavasena kāyānupassanaṃ vibhajitvā idāni paṭikūlamanasikāravasena vibhajituṃ puna caparantiādimāha.
atk-s0102a:1515_2: Tattha imameva kāyantiādīsu yaṃ vattabbaṃ siyā,
atk-s0102a:1515_3: taṃ sabbaṃ sabbākārena vitthārato visuddhimagge kāyagatāsatikammaṭṭhāne vuttaṃ.
atk-s0102a:1515_4: Ubhatomukhāti heṭṭhā ca upari cāti dvīhi mukhehi yuttā.
atk-s0102a:1516_1: ubhatomukhā putoḷi viya hi cātumahābhūtiko kāyo,
atk-s0102a:1516_2: tattha missetvā pakkhittanānāvidhadhaññaṃ viya kesādayo dvattiṃsākārā,
atk-s0102a:1516_4: tassa taṃ putoḷiṃ muñcitvā paccavekkhato nānāvidhadhaññassa pākaṭakālo viya yogino dvattiṃsākārassa vibhūtakālo veditabbo.
atk-s0102a:1516_5: Iti ajjhattaṃ vāti evaṃ kesādipariggaṇhanena attano vā kāye,
atk-s0102a:1516_8: kālena vā parassa kāye kāyānupassī viharati.
atk-s0102a:1516_10: Kevalañhi idha dvattiṃsākārapariggāhikā sati dukkhasaccanti evaṃ yojanaṃ katvā niyyānamukhaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0102a:1519_1: Evaṃ paṭikūlamanasikāravasena kāyānupassanaṃ vibhajitvā idāni dhātumanasikāravasena vibhajituṃ puna caparantiādimāha.
atk-s0102a:1519_3: yathā koci goghātako vā tasseva vā bhattavetanabhato antevāsiko gāviṃ vadhitvā vinivijjhitvā catasso
atk-s0102a:1519_4: disā gatānaṃ mahāpathānaṃ vemajjhaṭṭhānasaṅkhāte catumahāpathe koṭṭhāsaṃ koṭṭhāsaṃ katvā nisinno assa,
atk-s0102a:1519_5: evameva bhikkhu catunnaṃ iriyāpathānaṃ yena kenaci ākārena ṭhitattā yathāṭhitaṃ,
atk-s0102a:1519_6: yathāṭhitattā ca yathāpaṇihitaṃ kāyaṃ “atthi imasmiṃ kāye pathavīdhātu…pe…
atk-s0102a:1520_1: yathā goghātakassa gāviṃ posentassāpi āghātanaṃ āharantassāpi āharitvā tattha bandhitvā ṭhapentassapi
atk-s0102a:1520_2: vadhentassāpi vadhitaṃ mataṃ passantassāpi tāvadeva gāvīti saññā na antaradhāyati,
atk-s0102a:1520_3: yāva naṃ padāletvā bilaso na vibhajati.
atk-s0102a:1520_4: Vibhajitvā nisinnassa panassa gāvīti saññā antaradhāyati,
atk-s0102a:1520_11: evameva imassāpi bhikkhuno pubbe bālaputhujjanakāle gihibhūtassāpi pabbajitassāpi tāvadeva sattoti vā puggaloti vā saññā na antaradhāyati,
atk-s0102a:1520_12: yāva imameva kāyaṃ yathāṭhitaṃ yathāpaṇihitaṃ ghanavinibbhogaṃ katvā dhātuso na paccavekkhati.
atk-s0102a:1520_16: “‘imameva kāyaṃ yathāṭhitaṃ yathāpaṇihitaṃ dhātuso paccavekkhati ‘atthi imasmiṃ kāye pathavīdhātu āpodhātu tejodhātu vāyodhātū’ti.
atk-s0102a:1520_24: bilaso vibhajitvā nisinnabhāvo viya dhātuso paccavekkhaṇanti ayamettha pāḷivaṇṇanā.
atk-s0102a:1521_0: Iti ajjhattaṃ vāti evaṃ catudhātupariggaṇhanena attano vā kāye,
atk-s0102a:1521_3: kālena vā parassa kāye kāyānupassī viharati.
atk-s0102a:1521_5: Kevalañhi idha catudhātupariggāhikā sati dukkhasaccanti evaṃ yojanaṃ katvā niyyānamukhaṃ veditabbaṃ,
atk-s0102a:1524_1: Evaṃ dhātumanasikāravasena kāyānupassanaṃ vibhajitvā idāni navahi sivathikapabbehi vibhajituṃ puna caparantiādimāha.
atk-s0102a:1524_8: Kammārabhastā viya vāyunā uddhaṃ jīvitapariyādānā yathānukkamaṃ samuggatena sūnabhāvena uddhumātattā uddhumātaṃ,
atk-s0102a:1524_14: Maṃsussadaṭṭhānesu rattavaṇṇassa pubbasannicayaṭṭhānesu setavaṇṇassa yebhuyyena ca nīlavaṇṇassa nīlaṭṭhānesu
atk-s0102a:1524_16: Paribhinnaṭṭhānehi navahi vā vaṇamukhehi vissandamānapubbaṃ vipubbaṃ,
atk-s0102a:1525_0: So imameva kāyanti so bhikkhu imaṃ attano kāyaṃ tena kāyena saddhiṃ ñāṇena upasaṃharati upaneti. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0102a:1525_1: Ayampi kho kāyo evaṃdhammo evaṃbhāvī evaṃanatītoti.
atk-s0102a:1525_3: viññāṇanti imesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ dhammānaṃ atthitāya ayaṃ kāyo ṭhānagamanādikhamo hoti,
atk-s0102a:1525_4: imesaṃ pana vigamā ayampi kho kāyo evaṃdhammo evaṃ pūtikasabhāvoyeva,
atk-s0102a:1525_7: Iti ajjhattaṃ vāti evaṃ uddhumātādipariggaṇhanena attano vā kāye,
atk-s0102a:1525_10: kālena vā parassa kāye kāyānupassī viharati.
atk-s0102a:1526_0: Khajjamānanti udarādīsu nisīditvā udaramaṃsaoṭṭhamaṃsaakkhikūṭādīni luñcitvā luñcitvā khādiyamānaṃ.
atk-s0102a:1526_2: Nimaṃsalohitamakkhitanti maṃse khīṇepi lohitaṃ na sussati,
atk-s0102a:1526_5: Hatthaṭṭhikanti catusaṭṭhibhedampi hatthaṭṭhikaṃ pāṭiyekkaṃ pāṭiyekkaṃ vippakiṇṇaṃ.
atk-s0102a:1527_1: Pūtīnīti abbhokāse ṭhitāni vātātapavuṭṭhisamphassena terovassikāneva pūtīni honti,
atk-s0102a:1527_4: Sabbattha so imamevāti vuttanayena khajjamānādīnaṃ vasena yojanā kātabbā.
atk-s0102a:1527_5: Iti ajjhattaṃ vāti evaṃ khajjamānādipariggaṇhanena yāva cuṇṇakabhāvā attano vā kāye,
atk-s0102a:1527_6: parassa vā kāye kālena vā attano,
atk-s0102a:1527_7: kālena vā parassa kāye kāyānupassī viharati.
atk-s0102a:1528_1: Ekāhamataṃ vāti hi ādinā nayena vuttā sabbāpi ekā,
atk-s0102a:1528_6: aṭṭhikāni apagatasambandhānītiādikā ekā aṭṭhikāni setāni saṅkhavaṇṇapaṭibhāgānīti ekā,
atk-s0102a:1529_1: bhikkhaveti idaṃ navasivathikā dassetvā kāyānupassanaṃ niṭṭhapento āha.
atk-s0102a:1529_6: Evaṃ catusaccavasena ussakkitvā nibbutiṃ pāpuṇātīti idaṃ navasivathikapariggāhakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ yāva arahattā niyyānamukhanti.
atk-s0102a:1531_8: sivathikānaṃ pana ādīnavānupassanāvasena vuttattā sesāni dvādasāpi upacārakammaṭṭhānānevāti.
atk-s0102a:1534_1: Evaṃ bhagavā cuddasavidhena kāyānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānaṃ kathetvā idāni navavidhena vedanānupassanaṃ kathetuṃ kathañca,
atk-s0102a:1534_3: Tattha sukhaṃ vedananti kāyikaṃ vā cetasikaṃ vā sukhaṃ vedanaṃ vedayamāno “ahaṃ sukhaṃ vedanaṃ vedayāmī”ti pajānātīti attho.
atk-s0102a:1534_4: Tattha kāmaṃ uttānaseyyakāpi dārakā thaññapivanādikāle sukhaṃ vedayamānā “sukhaṃ vedanaṃ vedayāmā”ti pajānanti,
atk-s0102a:1534_5: na panetaṃ evarūpaṃ jānanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-s0102a:1534_8: kammaṭṭhānaṃ vā satipaṭṭhānabhāvanā vā na hoti.
atk-s0102a:1534_9: Imassa pana bhikkhuno jānanaṃ sattūpaladdhiṃ jahati,
atk-s0102a:1534_14: kiṃ kāraṇā vedanā”ti evaṃ sampajānavediyanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-s0102a:1535_0: Tattha ko vedayatīti na koci satto vā puggalo vā vedayati.
atk-s0102a:1535_1: Kassa vedanāti na kassaci sattassa vā puggalassa vā vedanā.
atk-s0102a:1535_2: Kiṃ kāraṇā vedanāti vatthuārammaṇāva panassa vedanā,
atk-s0102a:1535_3: tasmā esa evaṃ pajānāti “taṃ taṃ sukhādīnaṃ vatthuṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā vedanāva vedayati taṃ pana vedanāya
atk-s0102a:1535_5: Evaṃ vatthuṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā vedanāva vedayatīti sallakkhento esa “sukhaṃ vedanaṃ vedayāmīti pajānātī”ti veditabbo cittalapabbate aññataratthero viya.
atk-s0102a:1536_0: Thero kira aphāsukakāle balavavedanāya nitthunanto aparāparaṃ parivattati,
atk-s0102a:1536_6: Evaṃ jānanakālato paṭṭhāya adhivāsetuṃ vaṭṭati no,
atk-s0102a:1536_16: Thero vīriyasamataṃ yojetvā saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇitvā samasīsī hutvā parinibbāyi.
atk-s0102a:1537_2: nirāmisaṃ adukkhamasukhaṃ vedanaṃ vedayamāno “nirāmisaṃ adukkhamasukhaṃ vedanaṃ vedayāmī”ti pajānāti.
atk-s0102a:1537_3: Iti bhagavā rūpakammaṭṭhānaṃ kathetvā arūpakammaṭṭhānaṃ kathento yasmā phassavasena cittavasena vā kathiyamānaṃ pākaṭaṃ na hoti,
atk-s0102a:1537_5: vedanānaṃ pana uppattipākaṭatāya vedanāvasena pākaṭaṃ hoti,
atk-s0102a:1537_6: tasmā sakkapañhe viya idhāpi vedanāvasena arūpakammaṭṭhānaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0102a:1537_7: Tattha “duvidhañhi kammaṭṭhānaṃ rūpakammaṭṭhānaṃ arūpakammaṭṭhānañcā”tiādi kathāmaggo sakkapañhe vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
atk-s0102a:1538_0: Tattha sukhaṃ vedanantiādīsu ayaṃ aparopi pajānanapariyāyo,
atk-s0102a:1538_1: sukhaṃ vedanaṃ vedayāmīti pajānātīti sukhavedanākkhaṇe dukkhavedanāya abhāvato sukhaṃ vedanaṃ vedayamāno “sukhaṃ vedanaṃyeva vedayāmī”ti pajānāti.
atk-s0102a:1538_3: tassa idāni abhāvato imissā ca sukhāya vedanāya ito paṭhamaṃ abhāvato vedanā nāma aniccā adhuvā vipariṇāmadhammā,
atk-s0102a:1539_3: neva tasmiṃ samaye dukkhaṃ vedanaṃ vedeti,
atk-s0102a:1539_5: sukhaṃyeva tasmiṃ samaye vedanaṃ vedeti. Yasmiṃ,
atk-s0102a:1539_9: neva tasmiṃ samaye sukhaṃ vedanaṃ vedeti,
atk-s0102a:1539_11: adukkhamasukhaṃyeva tasmiṃ samaye vedanaṃ vedeti. Sukhāpi, kho,
atk-s0102a:1539_13: vedanā aniccā saṅkhatā paṭiccasamuppannā khayadhammā vayadhammā virāgadhammā nirodhadhammā. Dukkhāpi, kho…pe…
atk-s0102a:1540_0: Sāmisaṃ vā sukhantiādīsu sāmisā sukhā nāma pañcakāmaguṇāmisasannissitā cha gehasitasomanassavedanā.
atk-s0102a:1541_0: Iti ajjhattaṃ vāti evaṃ sukhavedanādipariggaṇhanena attano vā vedanāsu,
atk-s0102a:1541_3: kālena vā parassa vedanāsu vedanānupassī viharati.
atk-s0102a:1541_4: Samudayavayadhammānupassī vāti ettha pana avijjāsamudayā vedanāsamudayotiādīhi pañcahi pañcahi ākārehi
atk-s0102a:1541_5: vedanānaṃ samudayañca vayañca passanto “samudayadhammānupassī vā vedanāsu viharati,
atk-s0102a:1541_8: kālena vayadhammānupassī vā vedanāsu viharatī”ti veditabbo.
atk-s0102a:1541_10: Kevalañhi idha vedanāpariggāhikā sati dukkhasaccanti evaṃ yojanaṃ katvā vedanāpariggāhakassa bhikkhuno niyyānamukhaṃ veditabbaṃ,
atk-s0102a:1544_1: Evaṃ navavidhena vedanānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānaṃ kathetvā idāni soḷasavidhena cittānupassanaṃ kathetuṃ kathañca,
atk-s0102a:1544_5: Idaṃ pana yasmā sammasanaṃ na dhammasamodhānaṃ tasmā idha ekapadepi lokuttaraṃ na labbhati.
atk-s0102a:1544_6: Sesāni cattāri akusalacittāni neva purimapadaṃ na pacchimapadaṃ bhajanti.
atk-s0102a:1545_6: Samāhitanti yassa appanāsamādhi upacārasamādhi vā atthi.
atk-s0102a:1546_0: Iti ajjhattaṃ vāti evaṃ sarāgādipariggaṇhanena yasmiṃ yasmiṃ khaṇe yaṃ yaṃ cittaṃ pavattati,
atk-s0102a:1546_1: taṃ taṃ sallakkhento attano vā citte,
atk-s0102a:1546_4: kālena vā parassa citte cittānupassī viharati.
atk-s0102a:1546_5: Samudayavayadhammānupassīti ettha pana avijjāsamudayā viññāṇasamudayoti evaṃ pañcahi pañcahi ākārehi viññāṇassa samudayo ca vayo ca nīharitabbo.
atk-s0102a:1546_7: Kevalañhi idha cittapariggāhikā sati dukkhasaccanti evaṃ padayojanaṃ katvā cittapariggāhakassa bhikkhuno niyyānamukhaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0102a:1549_1: Evaṃ soḷasavidhena cittānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānaṃ kathetvā idāni pañcavidhena dhammānupassanaṃ kathetuṃ kathañca,
atk-s0102a:1550_1: Asantanti asamudācāravasena vā pahīnattā vā asaṃvijjamānaṃ.
atk-s0102a:1550_2: Yathā cāti yena kāraṇena kāmacchandassa uppādo hoti.
atk-s0102a:1550_4: Iti iminā nayena sabbapadesu attho veditabbo.
atk-s0102a:1551_0: Tattha subhanimitte ayonisomanasikārena kāmacchandassa uppādo hoti.
atk-s0102a:1551_3: Ayonisomanasikāro nāma anupāyamanasikāro uppathamanasikāro anicce niccanti vā,
atk-s0102a:1551_7: Taṃ tattha bahulaṃ pavattayato kāmacchando uppajjati.
atk-s0102a:1551_12: ayamāhāro anuppannassa vā kāmacchandassa uppādāya uppannassa vā kāmacchandassa bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāyā”ti.
atk-s0102a:1552_2: Yonisomanasikāro nāma upāyamanasikāro pathamanasikāro anicce aniccanti vā,
atk-s0102a:1552_6: Taṃ tattha bahulaṃ pavattayato kāmacchando pahīyati.
atk-s0102a:1552_11: ayamāhāro anuppannassa vā kāmacchandassa anuppādāya uppannassa vā kāmacchandassa pahānāyā”ti.
atk-s0102a:1553_0: Apica cha dhammā kāmacchandassa pahānāya saṃvattanti asubhanimittassa uggaho,
atk-s0102a:1553_7: bhāventassāpi indriyesu pihitadvārassāpi catunnaṃ pañcannaṃ ālopānaṃ okāse sati udakaṃ pivitvā yāpanasīlatāya bhojanamattaññunopi.
atk-s0102a:1556_0: Asubhakammikatissattherasadise asubhabhāvanārate kalyāṇamitte sevantassapi kāmacchando pahīyati,
atk-s0102a:1556_4: Imehi pana chahi dhammehi pahīnakāmacchandassa arahattamaggena āyatiṃ anuppādo hotīti pajānāti.
atk-s0102a:1557_0: Paṭighanimitte ayonisomanasikārena pana byāpādassa uppādo hoti.
atk-s0102a:1557_4: Taṃ tasmiṃ nimitte bahulaṃ pavattayato byāpādo uppajjati.
atk-s0102a:1557_9: ayamāhāro anuppannassa vā byāpādassa uppādāya uppannassa vā byāpādassa bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāyā”ti.
atk-s0102a:1558_0: Mettāya pana cetovimuttiyā yonisomanasikārenassa pahānaṃ hoti.
atk-s0102a:1558_1: Tattha mettāti vutte appanāpi upacāropi vaṭṭati.
atk-s0102a:1558_4: Taṃ tattha bahulaṃ pavattayato byāpādo pahīyati.
atk-s0102a:1558_9: ayamāhāro anuppannassa vā byāpādassa anuppādāya uppannassa vā byāpādassa pahānāyā”ti.
atk-s0102a:1559_0: Apica cha dhammā byāpādassa pahānāya saṃvattanti mettānimittassa uggaho mettābhāvanānuyogo kammassakatāpaccavekkhaṇā
atk-s0102a:1559_2: Odissakaanodissakadisāpharaṇānañhi aññataravasena mettaṃ uggaṇhantassāpi byāpādo pahīyati,
atk-s0102a:1559_6: nanu tvaṃ attano kammena āgantvā attano kammeneva gamissasi,
atk-s0102a:1559_7: parassa kujjhanaṃ nāma vītaccitaṅgāra tattaaya salākagūthādīni gahetvā paraṃ paharitukāmatāsadisaṃ hoti.
atk-s0102a:1559_10: esa attano kammena āgantvā attano kammeneva gamissati,
atk-s0102a:1559_11: appaṭicchitapaheṇakaṃ viya paṭivātaṃ khittarajomuṭṭhi viya ca etassevesa kodho matthake patissatī”ti
atk-s0102a:1559_12: evaṃ attano ca parassa ca kammassakataṃ paccavekkhatopi,
atk-s0102a:1559_14: assaguttattherasadise mettābhāvanārate kalyāṇamitte sevantassāpi byāpādo pahīyati.
atk-s0102a:1559_18: Imehi pana chahi dhammehi pahīnassa byāpādassa anāgāmimaggena āyatiṃ anuppādo hotīti pajānāti.
atk-s0102a:1560_5: Imesu aratiādīsu ayonisomanasikāraṃ bahulaṃ pavattayato thinamiddhaṃ uppajjati. Tenāha – “atthi,
atk-s0102a:1560_7: arati tandī vijambhitā bhattasammado cetaso līnattaṃ,
atk-s0102a:1561_2: Nikkamadhātu nāma kosajjato nikkhantatāya tato balavataraṃ.
atk-s0102a:1561_3: Parakkamadhātu nāma paraṃ paraṃ ṭhānaṃ akkamanato tatopi balavataraṃ.
atk-s0102a:1561_4: Imasmiṃ tippabhede vīriye yonisomanasikāraṃ bahulaṃ pavattayato thinamiddhaṃ pahīyati. Tenāha – “atthi,
atk-s0102a:1562_0: Apica cha dhammā thinamiddhassa pahānāya saṃvattanti –
atk-s0102a:1562_7: Āharahatthaka tatravaṭṭaka alaṃsāṭaka kākamāsaka bhuttavamitakabhojanaṃ bhuñjitvā rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhāne
atk-s0102a:1562_8: nisinnassa hi samaṇadhammaṃ karoto thinamiddhaṃ mahāhatthī viya ottharantaṃ āgacchati,
atk-s0102a:1562_9: catupañcaālopaokāsaṃ pana ṭhapetvā pānīyaṃ pivitvā yāpanasīlassa bhikkhuno taṃ na hotīti evaṃ atibhojane nimittaṃ gaṇhantassāpi thinamiddhaṃ pahīyati.
atk-s0102a:1562_14: mahākassapattherasadise pahīnathinamiddhe kalyāṇamitte sevantassāpi thinamiddhaṃ pahīyati.
atk-s0102a:1562_18: Imehi pana chahi dhammehi pahīnassa thinamiddhassa arahattamaggena āyatiṃ anuppādo hotīti pajānāti.
atk-s0102a:1563_0: Cetaso avūpasame ayonisomanasikārena uddhaccakukkuccassa uppādo hoti.
atk-s0102a:1563_3: Tattha ayonisomanasikāraṃ bahulaṃ pavattayato uddhaccakukkuccaṃ uppajjati. Tenāha – “atthi,
atk-s0102a:1564_0: Samādhisaṅkhāte pana cetaso vūpasame yonisomanasikārenassa pahānaṃ hoti. Tenāha – “atthi,
atk-s0102a:1565_0: Apica cha dhammā uddhaccakukkuccassa pahānāya saṃvattanti bahussutatā paripucchakatā vinaye pakataññutā vuddhasevitā kalyāṇamittatā sappāyakathāti.
atk-s0102a:1565_1: Bāhussaccenapi hi ekaṃ vā dve vā tayo vā cattāro vā pañca vā nikāye pāḷivasena atthavasena ca uggaṇhantassāpi uddhaccakukkuccaṃ pahīyati.
atk-s0102a:1565_5: upālittherasadise vinayadhare kalyāṇamitte sevantassāpi uddhaccakukkuccaṃ pahīyati,
atk-s0102a:1565_9: Imehi pana chahi dhammehi pahīne uddhaccakukkucce uddhaccassa arahattamaggena,
atk-s0102a:1565_10: kukkuccassa anāgāmimaggena āyatiṃ anuppādo hotīti pajānāti.
atk-s0102a:1566_0: Vicikicchāṭhānīyesu dhammesu ayonisomanasikārena vicikicchāya uppādo hoti.
atk-s0102a:1566_1: Vicikicchāṭhānīyā dhammā nāma punappunaṃ vicikicchāya kāraṇattā vicikicchāva.
atk-s0102a:1566_2: Tattha ayonisomanasikāraṃ bahulaṃ pavattayato vicikicchā uppajjati. Tenāha – “atthi,
atk-s0102a:1567_0: Kusalādidhammesu yonisomanasikārena panassā pahānaṃ hoti, tenāha – “atthi,
atk-s0102a:1567_2: kusalākusalā dhammā sāvajjānavajjā dhammā sevitabbāsevitabbā dhammā hīnapaṇītā dhammā kaṇhasukkasappaṭibhāgā dhammā.
atk-s0102a:1568_0: Apica cha dhammā vicikicchāya pahānāya saṃvattanti bahussutatā,
atk-s0102a:1568_7: pañca vā nikāye pāḷivasena ca atthavasena ca uggaṇhantassāpi vicikicchā pahīyati,
atk-s0102a:1568_11: saddhādhimutte vakkalittherasadise kalyāṇamitte sevantassāpi vicikicchā pahīyati,
atk-s0102a:1568_15: Imehi pana chahi dhammehi pahīnāya vicikicchāya sotāpattimaggena āyatiṃ anuppādo hotīti pajānāti.
atk-s0102a:1569_0: Iti ajjhattaṃ vāti evaṃ pañcanīvaraṇapariggaṇhanena attano vā dhammesu,
atk-s0102a:1569_3: kālena vā parassa dhammesu dhammānupassī viharati.
atk-s0102a:1569_4: Samudayavayā panettha subhanimittaasubhanimittādīsu ayonisomanasikārayonisomanasikāravasena pañcasu nīvaraṇesu vuttāyeva nīharitabbā.
atk-s0102a:1569_6: Kevalañhi idha nīvaraṇapariggāhikā sati dukkhasaccanti evaṃ yojanaṃ katvā nīvaraṇapariggāhakassa bhikkhuno niyyānamukhaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0102a:1572_1: Evaṃ pañcanīvaraṇavasena dhammānupassanaṃ vibhajitvā idāni pañcakkhandhavasena vibhajituṃ puna caparantiādimāha.
atk-s0102a:1572_2: Tattha pañcasu upādānakkhandhesūti upādānassa khandhā upādānakkhandhā,
atk-s0102a:1573_2: na ito paraṃ rūpaṃ atthīti sabhāvato rūpaṃ pajānāti.
atk-s0102a:1573_5: vitthārena pana rūpādīni visuddhimagge khandhakathāyameva vuttāni.
atk-s0102a:1573_6: Iti rūpassa samudayoti evaṃ avijjāsamudayādivasena pañcahākārehi rūpassa samudayo.
atk-s0102a:1573_7: Iti rūpassa atthaṅgamoti evaṃ avijjānirodhādivasena pañcahākārehi rūpassa atthaṅgamo.
atk-s0102a:1574_0: Iti ajjhattaṃ vāti evaṃ pañcakkhandhapariggaṇhanena attano vā dhammesu,
atk-s0102a:1574_3: kālena vā parassa dhammesu dhammānupassī viharati.
atk-s0102a:1574_4: Samudayavayā panettha “avijjāsamudayā rūpasamudayo”tiādīnaṃ pañcasu khandhesu vuttānaṃ paññāsāya lakkhaṇānaṃ vasena nīharitabbā.
atk-s0102a:1574_6: Kevalañhi idha khandhapariggāhikā sati dukkhasaccanti evaṃ yojanaṃ katvā khandhapariggāhakassa bhikkhuno niyyānamukhaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0102a:1577_1: Evaṃ pañcakkhandhavasena dhammānupassanaṃ vibhajitvā idāni āyatanavasena vibhajituṃ puna caparantiādimāha.
atk-s0102a:1577_2: Tattha chasu ajjhattikabāhiresu āyatanesūti cakkhu sotaṃ ghānaṃ jivhā kāyo manoti imesu chasu ajjhattikesu,
atk-s0102a:1577_3: rūpaṃ saddo gandho raso phoṭṭhabbo dhammoti imesu chasu bāhiresu.
atk-s0102a:1577_5: Rūpe ca pajānātīti bahiddhā catusamuṭṭhānikarūpañca yāthāvasarasalakkhaṇavasena pajānāti.
atk-s0102a:1577_6: Yañca tadubhayaṃ paṭicca uppajjati saṃyojananti yañca taṃ cakkhuṃ ceva rūpe cāti ubhayaṃ paṭicca.
atk-s0102a:1578_1: Cakkhudvāre tāva āpāthagataṃ iṭṭhārammaṇaṃ kāmassādavasena assādayato abhinandato kāmarāgasaṃyojanaṃ uppajjati.
atk-s0102a:1578_3: “Ṭhapetvā maṃ ko añño etaṃ ārammaṇaṃ vibhāvetuṃ samattho atthī”ti maññato mānasaṃyojanaṃ uppajjati.
atk-s0102a:1578_4: Etaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ niccaṃ dhuvanti gaṇhato diṭṭhisaṃyojanaṃ uppajjati.
atk-s0102a:1578_6: sattassa nu kho”ti vicikicchato vicikicchāsaṃyojanaṃ uppajjati.
atk-s0102a:1578_7: “Sampattibhave vata no idaṃ sulabhaṃ jāta”nti bhavaṃ patthentassa bhavarāgasaṃyojanaṃ uppajjati.
atk-s0102a:1578_8: “Āyatimpi evarūpaṃ sīlabbataṃ samādiyitvā sakkā laddhu”nti sīlabbataṃ samādiyantassa sīlabbataparāmāsasaṃyojanaṃ uppajjati.
atk-s0102a:1578_9: “Aho vata taṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ aññe na labheyyu”nti usūyato issāsaṃyojanaṃ uppajjati.
atk-s0102a:1578_10: Attanā laddhaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ aññassa maccharāyato macchariyasaṃyojanaṃ uppajjati.
atk-s0102a:1579_0: Yathā ca anuppannassāti yena kāraṇena asamudācāravasena anuppannassa tassa dasavidhassāpi saṃyojanassa uppādo hoti,
atk-s0102a:1579_2: Yathā ca uppannassāti appahīnaṭṭhena pana samudācāravasena vā uppannassa tassa dasavidhassāpi saṃyojanassa yena kāraṇena pahānaṃ hoti,
atk-s0102a:1579_4: Yathā ca pahīnassāti tadaṅgavikkhambhanappahānavasena pahīnassāpi tassa dasavidhassa saṃyojanassa yena kāraṇena āyatiṃ anuppādo hoti,
atk-s0102a:1579_6: Kena kāraṇena panassa āyatiṃ anuppādo hoti?
atk-s0102a:1579_7: Diṭṭhivicikicchāsīlabbataparāmāsaissāmacchariyabhedassa tāva pañcavidhassa saṃyojanassa sotāpattimaggena āyatiṃ anuppādo hoti.
atk-s0102a:1579_11: Sotañca pajānāti sadde cātiādīsupi eseva nayo.
atk-s0102a:1579_12: Apicettha āyatanakathā vitthārato visuddhimagge āyatananiddese vuttanayeneva veditabbā.
atk-s0102a:1580_0: Iti ajjhattaṃ vāti evaṃ ajjhattikāyatanapariggaṇhanena attano vā dhammesu bāhirāyatanapariggaṇhanena parassa vā dhammesu,

atk-s0102a:1583_5: Ettha hi sambujjhati āraddhavipassakato paṭṭhāya yogāvacaroti sambodhi.

atk-s0102a:1584_9: Taṃ tattha bahulaṃ pavattayato satisambojjhaṅgo uppajjati.

atk-s0102a:1585_5: ṭhānanisajjādīsu satisamuṭṭhāpanatthaṃ ninnapoṇapabbhāracittatāya ca satisambojjhaṅgo uppajjati.

atk-s0102a:1587_0: Apica satta dhammā dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya saṃvattanti paripucchakatā vatthuvisadakiriyā

atk-s0102a:1587_11: Tasmā kesādichedāpanena uddhaṃvirecanaadhovirecanādīhi sarīrasallahukabhāvakaraṇena ucchādananahāpanena ca ajjhattikavatthu visadaṃ kātabbaṃ.

atk-s0102a:1588_12: atha saddhindriyaṃ adhimokkhakiccaṃ kātuṃ na sakkoti,

atk-s0102a:1592_0: Apica ekādasa dhammā vīriyasambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya saṃvattanti apāyabhayapaccavekkhaṇatā ānisaṃsadassāvitā
atk-s0102a:1593_3: pettivisaye anekānipi vassasahassāni ekaṃ buddhantarampi khuppipāsāhi āturībhūtakālepi,
atk-s0102a:1593_6: ayameva te bhikkhu kālo vīriyakaraṇāyāti evaṃ apāyabhayaṃ paccavekkhantassāpi vīriyasambojjhaṅgo uppajjati.
atk-s0102a:1594_1: āraddhavīriyeneva sakkā ayamānisaṃso vīriyassāti evaṃ ānisaṃsadassāvinopi uppajjati.
atk-s0102a:1594_3: so ca na sakkā kusītena gantunti evaṃ gamanavīthiṃ paccavekkhantassāpi uppajjati.
atk-s0102a:1594_7: nāpi taṃ nissāya jīvissāmāti te paṇītāni cīvarādīni denti.
atk-s0102a:1594_8: Atha kho attano kārānaṃ mahapphalataṃ paccāsīsamānā denti.
atk-s0102a:1594_9: Satthārāpi “ayaṃ ime paccaye paribhuñjitvā kāyadaḷhībahulo sukhaṃ viharissatī”ti na evaṃ sampassatā tuyhaṃ paccayā anuññātā.
atk-s0102a:1594_10: Atha kho “ayaṃ ime paribhuñjamāno samaṇadhammaṃ katvā vaṭṭadukkhato muccissatī”ti te paccayā anuññātā,
atk-s0102a:1594_11: so dāni tvaṃ kusīto viharanto na taṃ piṇḍaṃ apacāyissati.
atk-s0102a:1594_12: Āraddhavīriyasseva hi piṇḍapātāpacāyanaṃ nāma hotīti evaṃ piṇḍapātāpacāyanaṃ paccavekkhantassāpi uppajjati ayyamittattherassa viya.
atk-s0102a:1595_1: Tassa ca gocaragāme ekā mahāupāsikā theraṃ puttaṃ katvā paṭijaggati.
atk-s0102a:1595_2: Sā ekadivasaṃ araññaṃ gacchantī dhītaraṃ āha – “amma,
atk-s0102a:1595_7: tava bhātikassa ayyamittassa āgatakāle bhattaṃ pacitvā khīrasappiphāṇitehi saddhiṃ dehi,
atk-s0102a:1595_9: Ahaṃ pana hiyyo pakkapārivāsikabhattaṃ kañjiyena bhuttāmhī”ti.
atk-s0102a:1595_11: Sākapaṇṇaṃ pakkhipitvā kaṇataṇḍulehi ambilayāguṃ pacitvā ṭhapehi ammā,ti.
atk-s0102a:1596_0: Thero cīvaraṃ pārupitvā pattaṃ nīharantova taṃ saddaṃ sutvā attānaṃ ovadi “mahāupāsikā kira kañjiyena pārivāsikabhattaṃ bhuñji,
atk-s0102a:1596_3: taṃ nissāya kho panesā neva khettaṃ na vatthuṃ na bhattaṃ na vatthaṃ paccāsīsati,
atk-s0102a:1596_5: tvaṃ etissā tā sampattiyo dātuṃ sakkhissasi,
atk-s0102a:1596_7: ayaṃ kho pana piṇḍapāto tayā sarāgena sadosena samohena na sakkā gaṇhitu”nti pattaṃ thavikāya pakkhipitvā
atk-s0102a:1596_8: gaṇṭhikaṃ muñcitvā nivattitvā kassakaleṇameva gantvā pattaṃ heṭṭhāmañce cīvaraṃ cīvaravaṃse ṭhapetvā
atk-s0102a:1596_9: “arahattaṃ apāpuṇitvā na nikkhamissāmī”ti vīriyaṃ adhiṭṭhahitvā nisīdi.

atk-s0102a:1598_0: Yassa te āsavā khīṇā, dakkhiṇeyyosi mārisā”ti. –

atk-s0102a:1600_2: Sā there gharadvāraṃ sampatte pattaṃ gahetvā sappiphāṇitayojitassa khīrapiṇḍapātassa pūretvā hatthe ṭhapesi.
atk-s0102a:1600_5: Therassa hi tadā ativiya parisuddho chavivaṇṇo ahosi,

atk-s0102a:1602_4: evaṃ kusītopi idaṃ ariyadhanadāyajjaṃ na labhati,
atk-s0102a:1603_1: satthuno hi te mātukucchismiṃ paṭisandhigaṇhanakālepi abhinikkhamanepi abhisambodhiyampi dhammacakkappavattanayamakapāṭihāriyadevorohanaāyusaṅkhāravossajjanesupi

atk-s0102a:1606_1: pahitatte puggale sevantassāpi ṭhānanisajjādīsu vīriyuppādanatthaṃ ninnapoṇapabbhāracittassāpi uppajjati.

atk-s0102a:1608_1: devatānussati upasamānussati lūkhapuggalaparivajjanatā siniddhapuggalasevanatā pasādanīyasuttantapaccavekkhaṇatā tadadhimuttatāti.

atk-s0102a:1608_6: dubbhikkhabhayādīsu paṇītabhojanaṃ sabrahmacārīnaṃ datvā “evaṃ nāma adamhā”ti cāgaṃ paccavekkhantassāpi,

atk-s0102a:1608_8: yehi guṇehi samannāgatā devatā devattaṃ pattā,
atk-s0102a:1608_10: samāpattiyā vikkhambhitā kilesā saṭṭhipi sattatipi vassāni na samudācarantīti paccavekkhantassāpi,
atk-s0102a:1608_16: Evaṃ uppannassa panassa arahattamaggena bhāvanāpāripūri hotīti pajānāti.

atk-s0102a:1614_6: Asamāhitapuggalaparivajjanatā nāma upacāraṃ vā appanaṃ vā appattānaṃ vikkhittacittānaṃ puggalānaṃ ārakā parivajjanaṃ.

atk-s0102a:1616_0: Apica pañca dhammā upekkhāsambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya saṃvattanti sattamajjhattatā saṅkhāramajjhattatā sattasaṅkhārakelāyanapuggalaparivajjanatā
atk-s0102a:1616_2: Tattha dvīhākārehi sattamajjhattataṃ samuṭṭhāpeti “tvaṃ attano kammena āgantvā attanova kammena gamissasi,
atk-s0102a:1616_3: esopi attanova kammena āgantvā attanova kammena gamissati,
atk-s0102a:1616_6: so tvaṃ kaṃ kelāyasī”ti evaṃ nissattapaccavekkhaṇena cāti.
atk-s0102a:1616_8: “idaṃ cīvaraṃ anupubbena vaṇṇavikāratañceva jiṇṇabhāvañca upagantvā pādapuñchanacoḷakaṃ hutvā yaṭṭhikoṭiyā chaḍḍanīyaṃ bhavissati,
atk-s0102a:1616_10: nāssa evaṃ vinassituṃ dadeyyā”ti evaṃ assāmikabhāvapaccavekkhaṇena ca,
atk-s0102a:1617_0: Sattasaṅkhārakelāyanapuggalaparivajjanatāti ettha yo puggalo gihi vā attano puttadhītādike,
atk-s0102a:1617_3: muhuttampi apassanto “asuko sāmaṇero kuhiṃ asuko daharo kuhi”nti bhantamigo viya ito cito ca oloketi,

atk-s0102a:1617_5: tumhe naṃ gahetvā kilamessathā”ti na deti,
atk-s0102a:1618_2: tāvakālikaṃ yācito “mayampi idaṃ mamāyantā na paribhuñjāma,
atk-s0102a:1618_5: Yo pana tesu dvīsupi vatthūsu majjhatto udāsino,
atk-s0102a:1618_7: Iti ayaṃ upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo evarūpaṃ sattasaṅkhārakelāyanapuggalaṃ ārakā parivajjantassāpi,
atk-s0102a:1618_10: Evaṃ uppannassa panassa arahattamaggena bhāvanāpāripūri hotīti pajānāti.
atk-s0102a:1619_0: Iti ajjhattaṃ vāti evaṃ attano vā satta sambojjhaṅge pariggaṇhitvā,
atk-s0102a:1619_3: kālena vā parassa sambojjhaṅge pariggaṇhitvā dhammesu dhammānupassī viharati.
atk-s0102a:1619_6: Kevalañhi idha bojjhaṅgapariggāhikā sati dukkhasaccanti evaṃ yojanaṃ katvā bojjhaṅgapariggāhakassa bhikkhuno niyyānamukhaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0102a:1622_1: Evaṃ sattabojjhaṅgavasena dhammānupassanaṃ vibhajitvā idāni catusaccavasena vibhajituṃ puna caparantiādimāha.
atk-s0102a:1622_2: Tattha idaṃ dukkhanti yathābhūtaṃ pajānātīti ṭhapetvā taṇhaṃ tebhūmakadhamme “idaṃ dukkha”nti yathāsabhāvato pajānāti,
atk-s0102a:1622_3: tasseva kho pana dukkhassa janikaṃ samuṭṭhāpikaṃ purimataṇhaṃ “ayaṃ dukkhasamudayo”ti,
atk-s0102a:1622_5: dukkhaparijānanaṃ samudayapajahanaṃ nirodhasacchikaraṇaṃ ariyamaggaṃ “ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminipaṭipadā”ti yathāsabhāvato pajānātīti attho.
atk-s0102a:1622_6: Avasesā ariyasaccakathā ṭhapetvā jātiādīnaṃ padabhājanakathaṃ visuddhimagge vitthāritāyeva.

atk-s0102a:1672_8: Ahaṃ kho panetaṃ nibbeṭhetuṃ na sakkhissāmi,
atk-s0102a:1673_0: Bhagavā pana tato pubbe na cirasseva sudhābhojanīyajātakaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0102a:1673_3: Bhagavatā ca kathitaṃ jātakaṃ vā suttantaṃ vā sakalajambudīpe patthaṭaṃ hoti,
atk-s0102a:1673_4: tena so “ettha nivāsino devaputtā natthī”ti na sakkā vattunti cintetvā devā te na manussāti āha.
atk-s0102a:1676_11: Manussaloke rājakulesu kāraṇikamanussā viya hi niraye nirayapālā honti.
atk-s0102a:1678_5: Ubbādhatīti divasassa dvikkhattuṃ nhatvā tikkhattuṃ vatthāni parivattetvā alaṅkatapaṭimaṇḍitānaṃ cakkavattiādīnampi
atk-s0102a:1678_6: manussānaṃ gandho yojanasate ṭhitānaṃ devatānaṃ kaṇṭhe āsattakuṇapaṃ viya bādhati.
atk-s0102a:1679_2: Tāvatiṃsānanti idañca dūre nibbattā tāva mā āgacchantu,
atk-s0102a:1680_1: Jaccandhūpamo maññe paṭibhāsīti jaccandho viya upaṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0102a:1681_3: Seyyo bhavissatīti paraloke sugatisukhaṃ bhavissatīti adhippāyo.
atk-s0102a:1682_7: Tadetaṃ sabbaso sukhaṃ byasati vikkhipatīti byasanaṃ.
atk-s0102a:1682_11: Apakkaṃ na paripācentīti apariṇataṃ akhīṇaṃ āyuṃ antarāva na upacchindanti.

atk-s0102a:1701_4: Paccanīkaṃ kattabbanti paccanīkaṃ paṭiviruddhaṃ viya kattabbaṃ amaññissaṃ,
atk-s0102a:1702_1: Saṅghātaṃ āpajjantīti saṅghātaṃ vināsaṃ maraṇaṃ āpajjanti.
atk-s0102a:1702_2: Na mahapphaloti vipākaphalena na mahapphalo hoti.
atk-s0102a:1702_3: Na mahānisaṃsoti guṇānisaṃsena mahānisaṃso na hoti.
atk-s0102a:1702_4: Na mahājutikoti ānubhāvajutiyā mahājutiko na hoti.
atk-s0102a:1702_5: Na mahāvipphāroti vipākavipphāratāya mahāvipphāro na hoti.
atk-s0102a:1702_12: Vātātapahatānīti vātena ca ātapena ca hatāni pariyādinnatejāni.
atk-s0102a:1702_14: Asukhasayitānīti yāni sukkhāpetvā koṭṭhe ākiritvā ṭhapitāni,
atk-s0102a:1702_19: anvaddhamāsaṃ anudasāhaṃ anupañcāhaṃ na vasseyyāti attho.
atk-s0102a:1702_20: Api nu tānīti api nu evaṃ khettabījavuṭṭhidose sati tāni bījāni aṅkuramūlapattādīhi uddhaṃ vuddhiṃ heṭṭhā virūḷhiṃ samantato ca vepullaṃ āpajjeyyunti.
atk-s0102a:1702_21: Evarūpo kho rājañña yaññoti evarūpaṃ rājañña dānaṃ parūpaghātena uppāditapaccayatopi dāyakatopi pariggāhakatopi avisuddhattā na mahapphalaṃ hoti.
atk-s0102a:1703_0: Evarūpo kho rājañña yaññoti evarūpaṃ rājaññadānaṃ aparūpaghātena uppannapaccayatopi aparūpaghātitāya
atk-s0102a:1703_2: Sace pana guṇātirekaṃ nirodhā vuṭṭhitaṃ paṭiggāhakaṃ labhati,
atk-s0102a:1704_1: Imaṃ pana therassa dhammakathaṃ sutvā pāyāsirājañño theraṃ nimantetvā sattāhaṃ therassa mahādānaṃ datvā tato paṭṭhāya mahājanassa dānaṃ paṭṭhapesi.
atk-s0102a:1704_2: Taṃ sandhāya atha kho pāyāsi rājaññotiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0102a:1704_5: Dhorakāni ca vatthānīti thūlāni ca vatthāni.
atk-s0102a:1705_4: na cittīkārampi paccupaṭṭhāpetvā na paṇītacittaṃ katvā adāsi.
atk-s0102a:1705_6: Suññaṃ serīsakanti serīsakaṃ nāma ekaṃ tucchaṃ rajatavimānaṃ upagato.
atk-s0102a:1706_1: Āyasmā gavaṃpatīti thero kira pubbe manussakāle gopāladārakānaṃ jeṭṭhako hutvā mahato sirīsassa mūlaṃ
atk-s0102a:1706_2: sodhetvā vālikaṃ okiritvā ekaṃ piṇḍapātikattheraṃ rukkhamūle nisīdāpetvā attanā laddhaṃ āhāraṃ datvā
atk-s0102a:1706_3: tato cuto tassānubhāvena tasmiṃ rajatavimāne nibbatti.
atk-s0102a:1706_6: tato paññāsa vassāni gatānīti devaputto saṃvegaṃ āpajjati.
atk-s0102a:1706_7: So aparena samayena amhākaṃ bhagavato kāle manussesu nibbattitvā satthu dhammakathaṃ sutvā arahattaṃ patto.
atk-s0102a:1706_8: Pubbāciṇṇavasena pana divāvihāratthāya tadeva vimānaṃ abhiṇhaṃ gacchati,
atk-s0102a:1706_10: Taṃ sandhāya “tena kho pana samayena āyasmā gavaṃpatī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0102a:1707_0: So sakkaccaṃ dānaṃ datvāti so parassa santakampi dānaṃ sakkaccaṃ datvā.
atk-s0102a:1707_2: Tañca pana therassa ārocanaṃ sutvā mahājano sakkaccaṃ dānaṃ datvā devaloke nibbatto.
atk-s0102a:1707_3: Pāyāsissa pana rājaññassa paricārakā sakkaccaṃ dānaṃ datvāpi nikantivasena gantvā tasseva santike nibbattā.
atk-s0102a:1707_5: Pāyāsidevaputto ca ekadivasaṃ vāṇijakānaṃ dassetvā attano katakammaṃ kathesīti.
